entry.title: ShiroÁöÑÊã¶Êà™Âô®Êú∫Âà∂
entry.content:
Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ : ShiroÁöÑÊã¶Êà™Êú∫Âà∂

ÈªòËÆ§Êã¶Êà™Âô®

ShiroÂÜÖÁΩÆ‰∫ÜÂæàÂ§öÈªòËÆ§ÁöÑÊã¶Êà™Âô®,ÊØîÂ¶ÇË∫´‰ªΩÈ™åËØÅ„ÄÅÊéàÊùÉÁ≠âÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑ.Êõ¥Â§öÈªòËÆ§Êã¶Êà™Âô®ÂèØ‰ª•ÂèÇËÄÉ org.apache.shiro.web.filter.mgt.DefaultFilter‰∏≠ÁöÑÊûö‰∏æÊã¶Êà™Âô®,Â¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

/** * Enum representing all of the default Shiro Filter instances available to web applications.   * Each filter instance is typically accessible  * in configuration the {@link #name() name} of the enum constant. * * @since 1.0 */public enum DefaultFilter {    anon(AnonymousFilter.class),    authc(FormAuthenticationFilter.class),    authcBasic(BasicHttpAuthenticationFilter.class),    logout(LogoutFilter.class),    noSessionCreation(NoSessionCreationFilter.class),    perms(PermissionsAuthorizationFilter.class),    port(PortFilter.class),    rest(HttpMethodPermissionFilter.class),    roles(RolesAuthorizationFilter.class),    ssl(SslFilter.class),    user(UserFilter.class);    private final Class<? extends Filter> filterClass;    private DefaultFilter(Class<? extends Filter> filterClass) {        this.filterClass = filterClass;    }    public Filter newInstance() {        return (Filter) ClassUtils.newInstance(this.filterClass);    }    public Class<? extends Filter> getFilterClass() {        return this.filterClass;    }    public static Map<String, Filter> createInstanceMap(FilterConfig config) {        Map<String, Filter> filters = new LinkedHashMap<String, Filter>(values().length);        for (DefaultFilter defaultFilter : values()) {            Filter filter = defaultFilter.newInstance();            if (config != null) {                try {                    filter.init(config);                } catch (ServletException e) {                    String msg = "Unable to correctly init default filter instance of type " +                            filter.getClass().getName();                    throw new IllegalStateException(msg, e);                }            }            filters.put(defaultFilter.name(), filter);        }        return filters;    }}

ËøáÊª§Âô®ÁÆÄÁß∞ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑjavaÁ±ª
anonorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authc.AnonymousFilter
authcorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authc.FormAuthenticationFilter
authcBasicorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authc.BasicHttpAuthenticationFilter
rolesorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authz.RolesAuthorizationFilter
permsorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authz.PermissionsAuthorizationFilter
userorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authc.UserFilter
logoutorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authc.LogoutFilter
portorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authz.PortFilter
restorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authz.HttpMethodPermissionFilter
sslorg.apache.shiro.web.filter.authz.SslFilter
  1. anon : ÂåøÂêçÊã¶Êà™Âô®,Âç≥‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÁôªÂΩïÂç≥ÂèØËÆøÈóÆ. ‰∏ÄËà¨Áî®‰∫éÈùôÊÄÅËµÑÊ∫êËøáÊª§,Á§∫‰æã‚Äù/static/**=anon‚Äù
  2. authc : Ë°®Á§∫ÈúÄË¶ÅËÆ§ËØÅ(ÁôªÂΩï)ÊâçËÉΩ‰ΩøÁî®,Á§∫‰æã‚Äù/**=authc‚Äù,‰∏ªË¶ÅÂ±ûÊÄßÊúâ :
    • usernameParam : Ë°®ÂçïÊèê‰∫§ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÂêçÂèÇÊï∞Âêç(username)
    • passwordParam : Ë°®ÂçïÊèê‰∫§ÁöÑÂØÜÁ†ÅÂèÇÊï∞Âêç(password)
    • rememberMeParam : Ë°®ÂçïÊèê‰∫§ÁöÑÂØÜÁ†ÅÂèÇÊï∞Âêç(rememberMe)
    • loginUrl : ÁôªÂΩïËØ∑Ê±ÇÂú∞ÂùÄ(/login.jsp)
    • successUrl : ÁôªÂΩïÊàêÂäüÂêéÁöÑÈªòËÆ§ÈáçÂÆöÂêëÂú∞ÂùÄ
    • failureKeyAttribute : ÁôªÂΩïÂ§±Ë¥•ÂêéÈîôËØØ‰ø°ÊÅØÂ≠òÂÇ®key(shiroLoginFailure)
  3. authcBasic : Basic HTTPË∫´‰ªΩÈ™åËØÅÊã¶Êà™Âô®,‰∏ªË¶ÅÂ±ûÊÄß : applicationName:ÂºπÂá∫ÁôªÂΩïÊ°ÜÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØ(application)
  4. roles : ËßíËâ≤ÊéàÊùÉÊã¶Êà™Âô®,È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâËµÑÊ∫êËßíËâ≤. Á§∫‰æã‚Äù/admin/**=roles[admin]‚Äù
  5. perms : ÊùÉÈôêÊéàÊùÉÊã¶Êà™Âô®,È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâËµÑÊ∫êÊùÉÈôê. Á§∫‰æã‚Äù/user/create=perms[‚Äúuser:create‚Äù]‚Äù
  6. user : Áî®Êà∑Êã¶Êà™Âô®,Áî®Êà∑Â∑≤ÁªèË∫´‰ªΩÈ™åËØÅ/ËÆ∞‰ΩèÊàëÁöÑÁôªÂΩï. Á§∫‰æã‚Äù/index=user‚Äù
  7. logout : ÈÄÄÂá∫Êã¶Êà™Âô®,‰∏ªË¶ÅÂ±ûÊÄß : redirectUrl:ÈÄÄÂá∫ÊàêÂäüÂêéÈáçÂÆöÂêëÁöÑÂú∞ÂùÄ(/). Á§∫‰æã‚Äù/logout=logout‚Äù
  8. port : Á´ØÂè£Êã¶Êà™Âô®,‰∏ªË¶ÅÂ±ûÊÄß : port(80):ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáÁöÑÁ´ØÂè£. Á§∫‰æã‚Äù/test= port[80]‚Äù,Â¶ÇÊûúÁî®Êà∑ËÆøÈóÆËØ•È°µÈù¢ÊòØÈùû80,Â∞ÜËá™Âä®Â∞ÜËØ∑Ê±ÇÁ´ØÂè£Êîπ‰∏∫80Âπ∂ÈáçÂÆöÂêëÂà∞ËØ•80Á´ØÂè£,ÂÖ∂‰ªñË∑ØÂæÑ/ÂèÇÊï∞Á≠âÁõ∏Âêå
  9. rest : restÈ£éÊ†ºÊã¶Êà™Âô®,Ëá™Âä®Ê†πÊçÆËØ∑Ê±ÇÊñπÊ≥ïÊûÑÂª∫ÊùÉÈôêÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤(GET=read,POST=create,PUT=update,DELETE=delete,HEAD=read,TRACE=read,OPTIONS=read, MKCOL=create)ÊûÑÂª∫ÊùÉÈôêÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤. Á§∫‰æã‚Äù/users=rest[user]‚Äù,‰ºöËá™Âä®ÊãºÂá∫‚Äùuser:read,user:create,user:update,user:delete‚ÄùÊùÉÈôêÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ËøõË°åÊùÉÈôêÂåπÈÖç(ÊâÄÊúâÈÉΩÂæóÂåπÈÖç:isPermittedAll)
  10. ssl : SSLÊã¶Êà™Âô®,Âè™ÊúâËØ∑Ê±ÇÂçèËÆÆÊòØhttpsÊâçËÉΩÈÄöËøá. Âê¶ÂàôËá™Âä®Ë∑≥ËΩ¨‰ºöhttpsÁ´ØÂè£(443). ÂÖ∂‰ªñÂíåportÊã¶Êà™Âô®‰∏ÄÊ†∑
  • Ê≥® : anon,authcBasic,auchc,userÊòØËÆ§ËØÅËøáÊª§Âô®. perms,roles,ssl,rest,portÊòØÊéàÊùÉËøáÊª§Âô®

entry.title: Shiro‰πãÁî®Êà∑ÊéàÊùÉ
entry.content:
Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ : ËØ¶Ëß£ShiroÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÊéàÊùÉ

ÁÆÄ‰ªã : ÊéàÊùÉ,‰πüÂè´ËÆøÈóÆÊéßÂà∂,Âç≥Âú®Â∫îÁî®‰∏≠ÊéßÂà∂Ë∞ÅËÉΩËÆøÈóÆÂì™‰∫õËµÑÊ∫ê(Â¶ÇËÆøÈóÆÈ°µÈù¢/ÁºñËæëÊï∞ÊçÆ/È°µÈù¢Êìç‰ΩúÁ≠â). Âú®ÊéàÊùÉ‰∏≠ÈúÄ‰∫ÜËß£ÁöÑÂá†‰∏™ÂÖ≥ÈîÆÂØπË±° : ‰∏ª‰Ωì(Subject)„ÄÅËµÑÊ∫ê(Resource)„ÄÅÊùÉÈôê(Permission)„ÄÅËßíËâ≤(Role),ÂÖ∂Ëß£ÊûêÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

  1. ‰∏ª‰Ωì : ‰∏ª‰Ωì,Âç≥ËÆøÈóÆÂ∫îÁî®ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑,Âú®Shiro‰∏≠‰ΩøÁî®Subject‰ª£Ë°®ËØ•Áî®Êà∑. Áî®Êà∑Âè™ÊúâÊéàÊùÉÂêéÊâçÂÖÅËÆ∏ËÆøÈóÆÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑËµÑÊ∫ê

  2. ËµÑÊ∫ê : Âú®Â∫îÁî®‰∏≠Áî®Êà∑ÂèØ‰ª•ËÆøÈóÆÁöÑ‰ªª‰ΩïËµÑÊ∫ê,ÊØîÂ¶ÇËÆøÈóÆJSPÈ°µÈù¢„ÄÅÊü•Áúã/ÁºñËæëÊüê‰∫õÊï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÅËÆøÈóÆÊüê‰∏™‰∏öÂä°ÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÅÊâìÂç∞ÊñáÊú¨Á≠âÁ≠â..Áî®Êà∑ÈúÄË¶ÅÊéàÊùÉÂêéÊñπÂèØËÆøÈóÆ

  3. ÊùÉÈôê : ÂÆâÂÖ®Á≠ñÁï•‰∏≠ÁöÑÂéüÂ≠êÊéàÊùÉÂçï‰Ωç,ÂèØÁî®ÊùÉÈôêÊéßÂà∂Áî®Êà∑Âú®Â∫îÁî®‰∏≠ÊòØÂê¶ËÉΩËÆøÈóÆÊüê‰∏™ËµÑÊ∫ê,Â¶ÇËÆøÈóÆÁî®Êà∑ÂàóË°®È°µÈù¢,Êü•Áúã/Êñ∞Â¢û/‰øÆÊîπ/Âà†Èô§Áî®Êà∑Êï∞ÊçÆ(Âü∫Êú¨‰∏∫CRUDÂºèÊùÉÈôêÊéßÂà∂)..

  4. ËßíËâ≤ : ËßíËâ≤‰ª£Ë°®‰∫ÜÊìç‰ΩúÈõÜÂêà,ÂèØ‰ª•ÁêÜËß£‰∏∫ÊùÉÈôêÁöÑÈõÜÂêà,‰∏ÄËà¨ÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ãÊàë‰ª¨‰ºöËµã‰∫àÁî®Êà∑ËßíËâ≤ËÄå‰∏çÊòØÊùÉÈôê,Âç≥ËøôÊ†∑Áî®Êà∑ÂèØ‰ª•Êã•Êúâ‰∏ÄÁªÑÊùÉÈôê,‰∏çÂêåÁöÑËßíËâ≤Êã•Êúâ‰∏ÄÁªÑ‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÊùÉÈôê

    • ÈöêÂºèËßíËâ≤ : Âç≥Áõ¥Êé•ÈÄöËøáËßíËâ≤Êù•È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÊúâÊ≤°ÊúâÊìç‰ΩúÊùÉÈôê,Âç≥Á≤íÂ∫¶ÊòØ‰ª•ËßíËâ≤‰∏∫Âçï‰ΩçËøõË°åËÆøÈóÆÊéßÂà∂ÁöÑ,Á≤íÂ∫¶ËæÉÁ≤ó. Ëã•ËøõË°åÂèòÊõ¥ÂèØËÉΩÈúÄË¶ÅÂ§öÂ§Ñ‰ª£Á†ÅÁöÑ‰øÆÊîπ
    • ÊòæÁ§∫ËßíËâ≤ : Âú®Á®ãÂ∫è‰∏≠ÈÄöËøáÊùÉÈôêÊéßÂà∂Ë∞ÅËÉΩËÆøÈóÆÊüê‰∏™ËµÑÊ∫ê,ËßíËâ≤ËÅöÂêà‰∏ÄÁªÑÊùÉÈôêÈõÜÂêà. ËøôÊ†∑Ëã•ÈúÄË¶ÅÂì™‰∏™ËßíËâ≤‰∏çËÉΩËÆøÈóÆÊüê‰∏™ËµÑÊ∫ê,Âè™ÈúÄË¶Å‰ªéËßíËâ≤‰ª£Ë°®ÁöÑÊùÉÈôêÈõÜÂêà‰∏≠ÁßªÈô§ÊåáÂÆöÁöÑËÆøÈóÆÊùÉÈôêÂç≥ÂèØ,Êó†È°ª‰øÆÊîπÂ§öÂ§Ñ‰ª£Á†Å

ÊéàÊùÉÊñπÂºè

Shiro ÊîØÊåÅ‰∏âÁßçÊñπÂºèÁöÑÊéàÊùÉ,Â¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

  1. ÁºñÁ®ãÂºè : ÈÄöËøáÂÜôif/elseÊéàÊùÉ‰ª£Á†ÅÂùóÂÆåÊàê

    Subject subject = SecurityUtils.getSubject();if(subject.hasRole("admin")) {    //ÊúâÊùÉÈôê} else {    //Êó†ÊùÉÈôê}

  2. Ê≥®Ëß£Âºè : ÈÄöËøáÂú®ÊâßË°åÁöÑJavaÊñπÊ≥ï‰∏äÊîæÁΩÆÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑÊ≥®Ëß£ÂÆåÊàê

    @RequiresRoles("admin")public void hello() {    //ÊúâÊùÉÈôê}

  3. JSP/GSP Ê†áÁ≠æ : Âú®JSP/GSPÈ°µÈù¢ÈÄöËøáÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑÊ†áÁ≠æÂÆåÊàê

    <shiro:hasRole name="admin"><!‚Äî ÊúâÊùÉÈôê ‚Äî></shiro:hasRole>

ÊéàÊùÉÊµÅÁ®ã

  1. È¶ñÂÖàË∞ÉÁî®`Subject.isPermitted/hasRole`Êé•Âè£,ÂÖ∂‰ºöÂßîÊâòÁªôSecurityManager,ËÄåSecurityManagerÊé•ÁùÄ‰ºöÂßîÊâòÁªôAuthorizer
  2. AuthorizerÊòØÁúüÊ≠£ÁöÑÊéàÊùÉËÄÖ,Â¶ÇÊûúÊàë‰ª¨Ë∞ÉÁî®Â¶ÇisPermitted(‚Äúuser:create‚Äù),ÂÖ∂È¶ñÂÖà‰ºöÈÄöËøáPermissionResolverÊääÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ËΩ¨Êç¢ÊàêÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑPermissionÂÆû‰æã
  3. Âú®ËøõË°åÊéàÊùÉ‰πãÂâç,ÂÖ∂‰ºöË∞ÉÁî®Áõ∏Â∫îÁöÑRealmËé∑ÂèñSubjectÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑËßíËâ≤/ÊùÉÈôêÁî®‰∫éÂåπÈÖç‰º†ÂÖ•ÁöÑËßíËâ≤/ÊùÉÈôê
  4. Authorizer‰ºöÂà§Êñ≠RealmÁöÑËßíËâ≤/ÊùÉÈôêÊòØÂê¶Âíå‰º†ÂÖ•ÁöÑÂåπÈÖç,Â¶ÇÊûúÊúâÂ§ö‰∏™Realm,Âàô‰ºöÂßîÊâòÁªôModularRealmAuthorizerËøõË°åÂæ™ÁéØÂà§Êñ≠,Â¶ÇÊûúÂåπÈÖçÂ¶Ç`isPermitted/hasRole`‰ºöËøîÂõûtrue,Âê¶ÂàôËøîÂõûfalse‰ª•Ë°®Á§∫ÊéàÊùÉÂ§±Ë¥•

iniÊñπÂºèÊ£ÄÊü•Áî®Êà∑Êã•ÊúâÁöÑËßíËâ≤

ÈÄöËøáÂä†ËΩΩiniÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÊñπÂºè,Êù•ÂÆûÁé∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Áî®‰∫éÊ£ÄÊü•Áî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÊåáÂÆöËßíËâ≤ÁöÑÁ®ãÂ∫è~

  1. pom.xml : Maven‰æùËµñ

    <dependencies>    <dependency>        <groupId>junit</groupId>        <artifactId>junit</artifactId>        <version>4.11</version>        <scope>test</scope>    </dependency>    <!-- ShiroÊ†∏ÂøÉÂåÖ -->    <dependency>        <groupId>org.apache.shiro</groupId>        <artifactId>shiro-core</artifactId>        <version>1.3.2</version>    </dependency>    <!-- slf4jÁöÑÊé•Âè£ÂÆûÁé∞ -->    <dependency>        <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>        <artifactId>slf4j-log4j12</artifactId>        <version>1.7.12</version>    </dependency>    <!-- java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/commons/logging/LogFactory -->    <dependency>        <groupId>commons-logging</groupId>        <artifactId>commons-logging</artifactId>        <version>1.2</version>    </dependency></dependencies>

  2. per-shiro.ini : Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÂèäÊùÉÈôêÈÖçÁΩÆ‰ø°ÊÅØ

    #ÊùÉÈôêË°®ËææÂºèÁöÑÂÆö‰πâ:È¶ñÂÖàÊ†πÊçÆÁî®Êà∑ÂêçÊü•ÊâæËßíËâ≤,ÂÜçÊ†πÊçÆËßíËâ≤Êü•ÊâæÊùÉÈôê,ËßíËâ≤ÊòØÊùÉÈôêÁöÑÈõÜÂêà[users]#Áî®Êà∑hunagyuhuiÁöÑÂØÜÁ†Å‰∏∫loveyourself,‰∏îÂÖ∑ÊúâstudentÂíåprogrammer‰∏§‰∏™ËßíËâ≤huangyuhui = loveyourself,student,programmer[roles]#ËßíËâ≤studentÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'Êã•Êúâcreate,updateÊùÉÈôêstudent = user:create,user:update#ËßíËâ≤programmerÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÂÖ∑Êúâinsert,deleteÊùÉÈôêprogrammer = user:read,user:delete

  3. RolesTest.java : È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ËßíËâ≤‰ø°ÊÅØ

    package pers.huangyuhui.permission;import org.apache.shiro.SecurityUtils;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.IncorrectCredentialsException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UnknownAccountException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UsernamePasswordToken;import org.apache.shiro.authz.UnauthorizedException;import org.apache.shiro.config.IniSecurityManagerFactory;import org.apache.shiro.mgt.SecurityManager;import org.apache.shiro.subject.Subject;import org.apache.shiro.util.Factory;import java.util.Arrays;import java.util.List;public class RolesTest {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //1:Âä†ËΩΩÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂,ÂàõÂª∫SecurityManagerÂ∑•ÂéÇÂØπË±°        Factory<SecurityManager> factory = new IniSecurityManagerFactory("classpath:per-shiro.ini");        //2:Ëé∑ÂæósecurityManagerÂÆû‰æãÂØπË±°        SecurityManager securityManager = factory.getInstance();        //3:Â∞ÜsecurityMangerÂÆû‰æãÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ÂΩìÂâçËøêË°åÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠,‰æø‰∫éËÆøÈóÆ        SecurityUtils.setSecurityManager(securityManager);        //4:ÂàõÂª∫ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁöÑ‰∏ª‰Ωì        Subject currentUser = SecurityUtils.getSubject();        //5:ÁªëÂÆö‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩïÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩ/Âá≠ËØÅ,Êó¢Ë¥¶Êà∑ÂèäÂØÜÁ†Å        UsernamePasswordToken token = new UsernamePasswordToken("huangyuhui", "loveyourself");        //6:‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩï        try {            currentUser.login(token);            System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :" + currentUser.isAuthenticated());            //7:ËøõË°åÁî®Êà∑ËßíËâ≤Âà§Êñ≠            System.out.println("Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•Êúâ'student'ËßíËâ≤ : " + currentUser.hasRole("student"));            System.out.println("Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶ÂêåÊó∂Êã•Êúâ'student'‰∏é'programmer'ËßíËâ≤ : " + currentUser.hasAllRoles(List.of("student", "programmer")));            System.out.println("Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•Êúâ'student','programmer','singer'ËßíËâ≤ : " + Arrays.toString(currentUser.hasRoles(List.of("student", "programmer", "singer"))));            //Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÊüê‰∏™ËßíËâ≤,Ëã•Êã•ÊúâËØ•ËßíËâ≤Âàô‰∏çÂÅö‰ªª‰ΩïÊìç‰Ωú(Êó†ËøîÂõûÂÄº),Âèç‰πãÂàôÊäõÂá∫:UnauthorizedException            currentUser.checkRole("singer");        } catch (UnknownAccountException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë¥¶Êà∑ÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (IncorrectCredentialsException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†ÅÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (UnauthorizedException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑Âπ∂‰∏çÊã•Êúâ'singer'ËßíËâ≤ !");        } catch (AuthenticationException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        //8:Ê≥®ÈîÄÁôªÂΩï        currentUser.logout();        System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :" + !currentUser.isAuthenticated());    }}

  4. Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÁªìÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

    // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :true// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•Êúâ'student'ËßíËâ≤ : true// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶ÂêåÊó∂Êã•Êúâ'student'‰∏é'programmer'ËßíËâ≤ : true// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•Êúâ'student','programmer','singer'ËßíËâ≤ : [true, true, false]// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑Âπ∂‰∏çÊã•Êúâ'singer'ËßíËâ≤ !// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :true

iniÊñπÂºèÊ£ÄÊü•Áî®Êà∑Êã•ÊúâÁöÑÊùÉÈôê

ÈÄöËøáÂä†ËΩΩiniÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂ÁöÑÊñπÂºè,Êù•ÂÆûÁé∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Áî®‰∫éÊ£ÄÊü•Áî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÊåáÂÆöÊùÉÈôêÁöÑÁ®ãÂ∫è~

  1. pom.xml : Maven‰æùËµñ(Âêå‰∏ä)

  2. per-shiro.ini : Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÂèäÊùÉÈôêÈÖçÁΩÆ‰ø°ÊÅØ(Âêå‰∏ä)

  3. PermissionTest.java : È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÊùÉÈôê‰ø°ÊÅØ

    package pers.huangyuhui.permission;import org.apache.shiro.SecurityUtils;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.IncorrectCredentialsException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UnknownAccountException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UsernamePasswordToken;import org.apache.shiro.authz.UnauthorizedException;import org.apache.shiro.config.IniSecurityManagerFactory;import org.apache.shiro.mgt.SecurityManager;import org.apache.shiro.subject.Subject;import org.apache.shiro.util.Factory;import java.util.Arrays;public class PermissionsTest {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //1:Âä†ËΩΩÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂,ÂàõÂª∫SecurityManagerÂ∑•ÂéÇÂØπË±°        Factory<SecurityManager> factory = new IniSecurityManagerFactory("classpath:per-shiro.ini");        //2:Ëé∑ÂæósecurityManagerÂÆû‰æãÂØπË±°        SecurityManager securityManager = factory.getInstance();        //3:Â∞ÜsecurityMangerÂÆû‰æãÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ÂΩìÂâçËøêË°åÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠,‰æø‰∫éËÆøÈóÆ        SecurityUtils.setSecurityManager(securityManager);        //4:ÂàõÂª∫ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁöÑ‰∏ª‰Ωì        Subject currentUser = SecurityUtils.getSubject();        //5:ÁªëÂÆö‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩïÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩ/Âá≠ËØÅ,Êó¢Ë¥¶Êà∑ÂèäÂØÜÁ†Å        UsernamePasswordToken token = new UsernamePasswordToken("huangyuhui", "loveyourself");        //6:‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩï        try {            currentUser.login(token);            System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :" + currentUser.isAuthenticated());            //7:ËøõË°åÁî®Êà∑ÊùÉÈôêÂà§Êñ≠            System.out.println("ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÁöÑ'create'‰∏é'read'ÊùÉÈôê : " + Arrays.toString(currentUser.isPermitted("user:create", "user:read")));            System.out.println("ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÁöÑ'update'‰∏é'delete'ÊùÉÈôê : " + Arrays.toString(currentUser.isPermitted("user:update", "user:delete")));            System.out.println("ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÁöÑ'import'‰∏é'export'ÊùÉÈôê : " + Arrays.toString(currentUser.isPermitted("user:import", "user:export")));            //Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÊüê‰∏™ÊùÉÈôê,Ëã•ÊúâÂàô‰∏çÂÅö‰ªª‰ΩïÊìç‰Ωú(Êó†ËøîÂõûÂÄº),Âèç‰πãÊäõÂá∫:UnauthorizedException            currentUser.checkPermission("user:getUserList");        } catch (UnknownAccountException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë¥¶Êà∑ÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (IncorrectCredentialsException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†ÅÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (UnauthorizedException e) {            System.err.println("ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑Âπ∂Êú™Êã•ÊúâÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÁöÑ'getUserList'ÊùÉÈôê !");        } catch (AuthenticationException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        //8:Ê≥®ÈîÄÁôªÂΩï        currentUser.logout();        System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :" + !currentUser.isAuthenticated());    }}

  4. Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÁªìÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

    // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :true// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÁöÑ'create'‰∏é'read'ÊùÉÈôê : [true, true]// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÁöÑ'update'‰∏é'delete'ÊùÉÈôê : [true, true]// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÁöÑ'import'‰∏é'export'ÊùÉÈôê : [false, false]// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑Âπ∂Êú™Êã•ÊúâÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÁöÑ'getUserList'ÊùÉÈôê !// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :true

Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâRealmÊ£ÄÊü•Áî®Êà∑Êã•ÊúâÁöÑÊùÉÈôê

ÈÄöËøáÈÖçÁΩÆËá™ÂÆö‰πâRealmÁöÑÊñπÂºè,Êù•ÂÆûÁé∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Áî®‰∫éÈ™åËØÅÁî®‰∫éËßíËâ≤ÂèäÊùÉÈôêÁöÑÁ®ãÂ∫è~

  1. pom.xml : Maven‰æùËµñ(Âêå‰∏ä)

  2. per-my-shiro.ini : ÈÖçÁΩÆËá™ÂÆö‰πâRealm

    #ÊåáÂÆöËá™ÂÆö‰πârealmmyRealm = pers.huangyuhui.permission.realm.PermissRealm#ÊåáÂÆöSecurityManagerÁöÑrealmsÂÆûÁé∞securityManager.realm = $myRealm

  3. PermissionRealm.java : Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâRealm,Âπ∂ÈÖçÁΩÆÁî®Êà∑ËßíËâ≤ÂèäÊùÉÈôê‰ø°ÊÅØ

    package pers.huangyuhui.permission.realm;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationToken;import org.apache.shiro.authc.SimpleAuthenticationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.authz.AuthorizationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.authz.SimpleAuthorizationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.realm.AuthorizingRealm;import org.apache.shiro.subject.PrincipalCollection;import java.util.ArrayList;import java.util.List;/** * @project: shiro-learning * @description: Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâRealm, ÈÖçÁΩÆÁî®Êà∑ËßíËâ≤ÂèäÊùÉÈôê‰ø°ÊÅØ * @author: ÈªÑÂÆáËæâ * @date: 8/2/2019-10:52 AM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class PermissRealm extends AuthorizingRealm {    @Override    public String getName() {        return "permissRealm";    }    @Override    //ÊéàÊùÉ:ÂÖ∂principalsÂ≠òÂÇ®ÁùÄÁî®Êà∑ËÆ§ËØÅÁöÑÂá≠ËØÅ‰ø°ÊÅØ    protected AuthorizationInfo doGetAuthorizationInfo(PrincipalCollection principals) {        //Ëé∑ÂèñÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁöÑÁî®Êà∑Âêç‰ø°ÊÅØ,Êó¢Áî®Êà∑Âá≠ËØÅ        //Object username = principals.getPrimaryPrincipal();        //Ê®°ÊãüÊü•ËØ¢Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ìÊìç‰Ωú:Êü•ËØ¢Áî®Êà∑ÊâÄÊã•ÊúâÁöÑÁöÑËßíËâ≤ÂèäÊùÉÈôê‰ø°ÊÅØ        List<String> roles = new ArrayList<>();        List<String> permiss = new ArrayList<>();        //ÂÅáËÆæËØ•Áî®Êà∑Êã•Êúâ'student'‰∏é'programmer'ËßíËâ≤        roles.add("student");        roles.add("programmer");        //ÂÅáËÆæËØ•Áî®Êà∑Êã•ÊúâÂØπËµÑÊ∫ê'user'ÁöÑ'read'‰∏é'update'ÊùÉÈôê        permiss.add("user:create");        permiss.add("user:update");        //Â∞ÅË£ÖÁî®Êà∑ÁöÑËßíËâ≤‰∏éÊùÉÈôê‰ø°ÊÅØÂπ∂ËøîÂõû        SimpleAuthorizationInfo info = new SimpleAuthorizationInfo();        info.addRoles(roles);        info.addStringPermissions(permiss);        return info;    }    @Override    //ËÆ§ËØÅ:ÂÖ∂tokenÂ≠òÂÇ®ÁùÄ‰º†ÂÖ•ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩ‰ø°ÊÅØ(usernamePasswordToken)    protected AuthenticationInfo doGetAuthenticationInfo(AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException {        //Ëé∑ÂèñÁî®Êà∑ÁöÑË¥¶Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÂπ∂È™åËØÅ        String username = (String) token.getPrincipal();        if (!"github".equals(username)) {            return null;        }        //Ê®°ÊãüÁî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†Å‰ø°ÊÅØ        String password = "yubuntu0109";        //SimpleAuthenticationInfo(Object principal, Object credentials, String realmName)        return new SimpleAuthenticationInfo(username, password, getName());    }}

  4. PermissTest.java : È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ËßíËâ≤ÂèäÊùÉÈôê‰ø°ÊÅØ

    package pers.huangyuhui.permission.realm;import org.apache.shiro.SecurityUtils;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.IncorrectCredentialsException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UnknownAccountException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UsernamePasswordToken;import org.apache.shiro.authz.UnauthorizedException;import org.apache.shiro.config.IniSecurityManagerFactory;import org.apache.shiro.mgt.SecurityManager;import org.apache.shiro.subject.Subject;import org.apache.shiro.util.Factory;import java.util.Arrays;import java.util.List;public class PermissTest {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //1:Âä†ËΩΩÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂,ÂàõÂª∫SecurityManagerÂ∑•ÂéÇÂØπË±°        Factory<SecurityManager> factory = new IniSecurityManagerFactory("classpath:my-per-shiro.ini");        //2:Ëé∑ÂæósecurityManagerÂÆû‰æãÂØπË±°        SecurityManager securityManager = factory.getInstance();        //3:Â∞ÜsecurityMangerÂÆû‰æãÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ÂΩìÂâçËøêË°åÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠,‰æø‰∫éËÆøÈóÆ        SecurityUtils.setSecurityManager(securityManager);        //4:ÂàõÂª∫ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁöÑ‰∏ª‰Ωì        Subject currentUser = SecurityUtils.getSubject();        //5:ÁªëÂÆö‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩïÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩ/Âá≠ËØÅ,Êó¢Ë¥¶Êà∑ÂèäÂØÜÁ†Å        UsernamePasswordToken token = new UsernamePasswordToken("github", "yubuntu0109");        //6:‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩï        try {            currentUser.login(token);            System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :" + currentUser.isAuthenticated());            //7:È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ËßíËâ≤            System.out.println("Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•Êúâ'student','programmer','singer'ËßíËâ≤ : "                    + Arrays.toString(currentUser.hasRoles(List.of("student", "programmer", "singer"))));            //8:È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÊùÉÈôê            System.out.println("ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÂØπ'user'ËµÑÊ∫êÁöÑ'create','update','read','delete'ÊùÉÈôê : "                    + Arrays.toString(currentUser.isPermitted("user:create", "user:update", "user:read", "user:delete")));        } catch (UnknownAccountException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë¥¶Êà∑ÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (IncorrectCredentialsException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†ÅÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (AuthenticationException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        //8:Ê≥®ÈîÄÁôªÂΩï        currentUser.logout();        System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :" + !currentUser.isAuthenticated());    }}

    // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :true// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•Êúâ'student','programmer','singer'ËßíËâ≤ : [true, true, false]// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑ÂΩìÂâçÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÂØπ'user'ËµÑÊ∫êÁöÑ'create','update','read','delete'ÊùÉÈôê : [true, true, false, false]// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :true

entry.title: Shiro‰πãËá™ÂÆö‰πârealmÂèäÂÖ∂Âä†ÂØÜ
entry.content:
Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ : Shiro‰πãËá™ÂÆö‰πârealmÂèäÂÖ∂Âä†ÂØÜ

Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâRealm

Realm : Âüü,Shiro‰ªéRealmËé∑ÂèñÂÆâÂÖ®Êï∞ÊçÆ(Â¶ÇÁî®Êà∑„ÄÅËßíËâ≤„ÄÅÊùÉÈôê),Â∞±ÊòØËØ¥SecurityManagerË¶ÅÈ™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩ,ÈÇ£‰πàÂÆÉÈúÄË¶Å‰ªéRealmËé∑ÂèñÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ËøõË°åÊØîËæÉ‰ª•Á°ÆÂÆöÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶ÂêàÊ≥ï. ‰πüÈúÄË¶Å‰ªéRealmÂæóÂà∞Áî®Êà∑Áõ∏Â∫îÁöÑËßíËâ≤ / ÊùÉÈôêËøõË°åÈ™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶ËÉΩËøõË°åÊìç‰Ωú,ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääRealmÁúãÊàê DataSource,Âç≥ÂÆâÂÖ®Êï∞ÊçÆÊ∫ê. Â¶ÇÊàë‰ª¨‰πãÂâçÁöÑiniÈÖçÁΩÆÊñπÂºè‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÊòØorg.apache.shiro.realm.text.IniRealmÊé•Âè£

org.apache.shiro.realm.RealmÊé•Âè£Â¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

//ËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂîØ‰∏ÄÁöÑRealmÂêçÂ≠óString getName(); //Âà§Êñ≠Ê≠§RealmÊòØÂê¶ÊîØÊåÅÊ≠§Tokenboolean supports(AuthenticationToken token); //Ê†πÊçÆTokenËé∑ÂèñËÆ§ËØÅ‰ø°ÊÅØAuthenticationInfo getAuthenticationInfo(AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException;

‰∏ãÈù¢ÈÄöËøáËá™ÂÆö‰πâRealmÊù•ÂÆûÁé∞‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÈ™åËØÅÁ®ãÂ∫è~

  1. pom.xml : Maven‰æùËµñ

    <dependencies>    <dependency>        <groupId>junit</groupId>        <artifactId>junit</artifactId>        <version>4.11</version>        <scope>test</scope>    </dependency>    <!-- ShiroÊ†∏ÂøÉÂåÖ -->    <dependency>        <groupId>org.apache.shiro</groupId>        <artifactId>shiro-core</artifactId>        <version>1.3.2</version>    </dependency>    <!-- slf4jÁöÑÊé•Âè£ÂÆûÁé∞ -->    <dependency>        <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>        <artifactId>slf4j-log4j12</artifactId>        <version>1.7.12</version>    </dependency>    <!-- java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/commons/logging/LogFactory -->    <dependency>        <groupId>commons-logging</groupId>        <artifactId>commons-logging</artifactId>        <version>1.2</version>    </dependency></dependencies>

  2. my-shiro.ini : Â≠òÂÇ®Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩ‰ø°ÊÅØ(Ë¥¶Êà∑=ÂØÜÁ†Å)

    #Ëá™ÂÆö‰πârealmmyRealm = pers.huangyuhui.realm.MyRealm#ÊåáÂÆöSecurityManagerÁöÑrealmsÂÆûÁé∞securityManager.realm = $myRealm

  3. MyRealm.java : Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâRealm,Ê®°Êãü‰ªéÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì‰∏≠Ëé∑ÂèñÁî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØ

    package pers.huangyuhui.realm;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationToken;import org.apache.shiro.authc.SimpleAuthenticationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.authz.AuthorizationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.realm.AuthorizingRealm;import org.apache.shiro.subject.PrincipalCollection;/** * @project: shiro-learning * @description: Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâRealm * @author: ÈªÑÂÆáËæâ * @date: 8/1/2019-5:59 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class MyRealm extends AuthorizingRealm {    @Override    public String getName() {        return "myRealm"; //Âå∫ÂàÜ‰∏çÂêåÁöÑRealm    }    @Override    //ÊéàÊùÉÊìç‰Ωú    protected AuthorizationInfo doGetAuthorizationInfo(PrincipalCollection principals) {        return null;    }    @Override    //ËÆ§ËØÅÊìç‰Ωú:ÂÖ∂tokenÂ≠òÂÇ®ÁùÄ‰º†ÂÖ•ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØ(usernamePasswordToken)    protected AuthenticationInfo doGetAuthenticationInfo(AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException {        //Ëé∑ÂèñÂπ∂È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑Ë¥¶Âè∑‰ø°ÊÅØ        String username = (String) token.getPrincipal();        if (!"root".equals(username)) {            return null;        }        //ÂÅáËÆæÁî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†Å‰ø°ÊÅØ        String password = "yubuntu0109";        //SimpleAuthenticationInfo(Object principal, Object credentials, String realmName)        SimpleAuthenticationInfo info = new SimpleAuthenticationInfo(username, password, getName());        return info;    }}

  4. LoginByMyRealm.java : È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØ

    package pers.huangyuhui.realm;import org.apache.shiro.SecurityUtils;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.IncorrectCredentialsException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UnknownAccountException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UsernamePasswordToken;import org.apache.shiro.config.IniSecurityManagerFactory;import org.apache.shiro.mgt.SecurityManager;import org.apache.shiro.subject.Subject;import org.apache.shiro.util.Factory;/** * ShiroËÆ§ËØÅÊµãËØï:È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØ */public class loginByMyRealm {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //1:Âä†ËΩΩÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂,ÂàõÂª∫SecurityManagerÂ∑•ÂéÇÂØπË±°        Factory<SecurityManager> factory = new IniSecurityManagerFactory("classpath:my-shiro.ini");        //2:Ëé∑ÂæósecurityManagerÂÆû‰æãÂØπË±°        SecurityManager securityManager = factory.getInstance();        //3:Â∞ÜsecurityMangerÂÆû‰æãÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ÂΩìÂâçËøêË°åÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠,‰æø‰∫éËÆøÈóÆ        SecurityUtils.setSecurityManager(securityManager);        //4:ÂàõÂª∫ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁöÑ‰∏ª‰Ωì        Subject currentUser = SecurityUtils.getSubject();        //5:ÁªëÂÆö‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩïÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩ/Âá≠ËØÅ,Êó¢Ë¥¶Êà∑ÂèäÂØÜÁ†Å        UsernamePasswordToken token = new UsernamePasswordToken("root", "yubuntu0109");        //6:‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩï        try {            currentUser.login(token);            System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :" + currentUser.isAuthenticated());        } catch (UnknownAccountException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë¥¶Êà∑ÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (IncorrectCredentialsException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†ÅÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (AuthenticationException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        //8:Ê≥®ÈîÄÁôªÂΩï        currentUser.logout();        System.out.println("Ë∫´‰ªΩË∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :" + !currentUser.isAuthenticated());    }}

  5. Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÁªìÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

    // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :true// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Ë∫´‰ªΩË∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :true

Âä†ÂØÜRealm

ShiroÊèê‰æõ‰∫Übase64Âíå16ËøõÂà∂Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÁºñÁ†Å / Ëß£Á†ÅÁöÑAPIÊîØÊåÅ,Êñπ‰æø‰∏Ä‰∫õÁºñÁ†ÅËß£Á†ÅÊìç‰Ωú. ShiroÂÜÖÈÉ®ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∫õÊï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÂ≠òÂÇ®ÂèäË°®Á§∫ÈÉΩ‰ΩøÁî®‰∫Ü base64Âíå16ËøõÂà∂Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤

Êï£ÂàóÁÆóÊ≥ï

Êï£ÂàóÁÆóÊ≥ï‰∏ÄËà¨Áî®‰∫éÁîüÊàêÊï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÊëòË¶Å‰ø°ÊÅØ,ÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßç‰∏çÂèØÈÄÜÁöÑÁÆóÊ≥ï,‰∏ÄËà¨ÈÄÇÂêàÂ≠òÂÇ®ÂØÜÁ†Å‰πãÁ±ªÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ,Â∏∏ËßÅÁöÑÊï£ÂàóÁÆóÊ≥ïÂ¶ÇMD5„ÄÅSHAÁ≠â. ‰∏ÄËà¨ËøõË°åÊï£ÂàóÊó∂ÊúÄÂ•ΩÊèê‰æõ‰∏Ä‰∏™salt(Áõê),ÊØîÂØÜÁ†Å‚Äùadmin‚ÄùÂä†ÂØÜÂêé‰∫ßÁîüÁöÑÊï£ÂàóÂÄºÊòØ‚Äù21232f297a57a5a743894a0e4a801fc3‚Äù,ÂÖ∂ÂèØ‰ª•Âà∞‰∏Ä‰∫õMD5Ëß£ÂØÜÁΩëÁ´ôÂæàÂÆπÊòìÁöÑÈÄöËøáÊï£ÂàóÂÄºÂæóÂà∞ÂØÜÁ†Å‚Äùadmin‚Äù,Âç≥Â¶ÇÊûúÁõ¥Êé•ÂØπÂØÜÁ†ÅËøõË°åÊï£ÂàóÁõ∏ÂØπÊù•ËØ¥Á†¥Ëß£Êõ¥ÂÆπÊòì,Ê≠§Êó∂Êàë‰ª¨ÂèØ‰ª•Âä†‰∏Ä‰∫õÂè™ÊúâÁ≥ªÁªüÁü•ÈÅìÁöÑÂπ≤Êâ∞Êï∞ÊçÆ,Â¶ÇÂú®ÂØÜÁ†Å‰∏≠Ê∑∑ÂÖ•Áî®Êà∑IDÂèäÁî®Êà∑Âêç(Âä†ÁõêÊìç‰Ωú),Êó¢ËÄåËøôÊ†∑ÁîüÊàêÁöÑÊï£ÂàóÂÄºÁõ∏ÂØπÊù•ËØ¥Êõ¥ÈöæÁ†¥Ëß£Âìü!

Âä†ÂØÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâRealm

Êé•‰∏ãÊù•ÈÄöËøá‰ΩøÁî®MD5Âä†ÂØÜËá™ÂÆö‰πâRealm,Êù•ÂÆåÊàê‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÈ™åËØÅÁ®ãÂ∫è~

  1. pom.xml : Maven‰æùËµñ(Âêå‰∏ä)

  2. en-shiro.ini : Â≠òÂÇ®Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÂèäÂä†ÂØÜÈÖçÁΩÆ‰ø°ÊÅØ

    [main]#ÂÆö‰πâÂá≠ËØÅÂåπÈÖçÂô®credentialsMatcher = org.apache.shiro.authc.credential.HashedCredentialsMatcher#Êï£ÂàóÁÆóÊ≥ïcredentialsMatcher.hashAlgorithmName = md5#Êï£ÂàóÊ¨°Êï∞credentialsMatcher.hashIterations = 10#Â∞ÜÂá≠ËØÅÂåπÈÖçÂô®ËÆæÁΩÆÂà∞realmmyRealm = pers.huangyuhui.encryption.EncryRealmmyRealm.credentialsMatcher = $credentialsMatchersecurityManager.realms = $myRealm

  3. EncryRealm.java : Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâRealm,Ê®°Êãü‰ªéÊï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì‰∏≠Ëé∑ÂèñÁî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØ

    package pers.huangyuhui.encryption;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationToken;import org.apache.shiro.authc.SimpleAuthenticationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.authz.AuthorizationInfo;import org.apache.shiro.realm.AuthorizingRealm;import org.apache.shiro.subject.PrincipalCollection;import org.apache.shiro.util.ByteSource;/** * @project: shiro-learning * @description: Âä†ÂØÜRealm * @author: ÈªÑÂÆáËæâ * @date: 8/1/2019-7:58 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class EncryRealm extends AuthorizingRealm {    @Override    public String getName() {        return "pwdRealm"; //Âå∫ÂàÜ‰∏çÂêåÁöÑRealm    }    @Override    //ÊéàÊùÉÊìç‰Ωú    protected AuthorizationInfo doGetAuthorizationInfo(PrincipalCollection principals) {        return null;    }    @Override    //ËÆ§ËØÅÊìç‰Ωú    protected AuthenticationInfo doGetAuthenticationInfo(AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException {        //Ëé∑ÂèñÁî®Êà∑Ë¥¶Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØ        String username = token.getPrincipal().toString();        if (!"root".equals(username)) {            return null;        }        //MD5Âä†ÂØÜÂêéÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†Å‰ø°ÊÅØ        String password = "f3005f7acf36cec973498845460b0c33";//password + username + 10        //ÊåáÂÆöÁõêÂÄº:ByteSource.Util.bytes(username)        return new SimpleAuthenticationInfo(username, password, ByteSource.Util.bytes(username), getName());    }}

  4. LoginByMyRealm.java : È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØ

    package pers.huangyuhui.encryption;import org.apache.shiro.SecurityUtils;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.IncorrectCredentialsException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UnknownAccountException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UsernamePasswordToken;import org.apache.shiro.config.IniSecurityManagerFactory;import org.apache.shiro.mgt.SecurityManager;import org.apache.shiro.subject.Subject;import org.apache.shiro.util.Factory;/** * ShiroËÆ§ËØÅÊµãËØï:È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØ */public class loginByMyRealm {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //1:Âä†ËΩΩÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂,ÂàõÂª∫SecurityManagerÂ∑•ÂéÇÂØπË±°        Factory<SecurityManager> factory = new IniSecurityManagerFactory("classpath:en-shiro.ini");        //2:Ëé∑ÂæósecurityManagerÂÆû‰æãÂØπË±°        SecurityManager securityManager = factory.getInstance();        //3:Â∞ÜsecurityMangerÂÆû‰æãÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ÂΩìÂâçËøêË°åÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠,‰æø‰∫éËÆøÈóÆ        SecurityUtils.setSecurityManager(securityManager);        //4:ÂàõÂª∫ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁöÑ‰∏ª‰Ωì        Subject currentUser = SecurityUtils.getSubject();        //5:ÁªëÂÆö‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩïÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩ/Âá≠ËØÅ,Êó¢Ë¥¶Êà∑ÂèäÂØÜÁ†Å        UsernamePasswordToken token = new UsernamePasswordToken("root", "yubuntu0109");        //6:‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩï        try {            currentUser.login(token);            System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :" + currentUser.isAuthenticated());        } catch (UnknownAccountException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë¥¶Êà∑ÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (IncorrectCredentialsException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†ÅÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (AuthenticationException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        //8:Ê≥®ÈîÄÁôªÂΩï        currentUser.logout();        System.out.println("Ë∫´‰ªΩË∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :" + !currentUser.isAuthenticated());    }}

  5. Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÁªìÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

    // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :true// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Ë∫´‰ªΩË∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :true

entry.title: ËØ¶Ëß£ShiroÁôªÂΩïÁôªÂá∫ÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÊµÅÁ®ã
entry.content:
Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ : ËØ¶Ëß£ShiroÁôªÂΩïÁôªÂá∫ÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÊµÅÁ®ã

Âú®shiro‰∏≠,Áî®Êà∑ÈúÄË¶ÅÊèê‰æõprincipals(Ë∫´‰ªΩ)Âíåcredentials(ËØÅÊòé)Áªôshiro,ÁªßËÄåÊù•È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩ‰ø°ÊÅØ,ÊúÄÂ∏∏ËßÅÁöÑprincpalsÂíå credentialsÁªÑÂêàÂ∞±ÊòØÁî®Êà∑Âêç / ÂØÜÁ†ÅÂï¶~

  • principals : Ë∫´‰ªΩ,Âç≥‰∏ª‰ΩìÁöÑÊ†áËØÜÂ±ûÊÄß,Â¶ÇÁî®Êà∑Âêç„ÄÅÈÇÆÁÆ±Á≠â,ÈúÄÂîØ‰∏Ä. ‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∏ª‰ΩìÂèØ‰ª•ÊúâÂ§ö‰∏™principals,‰ΩÜÂè™Êúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Primary principals,‰∏ÄËà¨ÊòØÁî®Êà∑Âêç / ÂØÜÁ†Å / ÊâãÊú∫Âè∑
  • credentials : ËØÅÊòé / Âá≠ËØÅ,Âç≥Âè™Êúâ‰∏ª‰ΩìÁü•ÈÅìÁöÑÂÆâÂÖ®ÂÄº,Â¶ÇÂØÜÁ†Å / Êï∞Â≠óËØÅ‰π¶Á≠â

ÁôªÂΩïÁôªÂá∫Ê°à‰æã

Êé•‰∏ãÊù•ÈÄöËøá‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê®°ÊãüÈ™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØÁöÑÁ§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫è,Êù•Êé¢Á©∂Âπ∂ÂàÜÊûê‰∏Ä‰∏ãShiroÁöÑÈ™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩ‰ø°ÊÅØÁöÑÊµÅÁ®ã

  1. pom.xml : Maven‰æùËµñ

    <dependencies>    <!--Junit ÂçïÂÖÉÊµãËØï -->    <dependency>        <groupId>junit</groupId>        <artifactId>junit</artifactId>        <version>4.11</version>        <scope>test</scope>    </dependency>    <!-- ShiroÊ†∏ÂøÉÂåÖ -->    <dependency>        <groupId>org.apache.shiro</groupId>        <artifactId>shiro-core</artifactId>        <version>1.3.2</version>    </dependency>    <!-- slf4jÁöÑÊé•Âè£ÂÆûÁé∞ -->    <dependency>        <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>        <artifactId>slf4j-log4j12</artifactId>        <version>1.7.12</version>    </dependency></dependencies>

  2. shiro.ini : Â≠òÂÇ®Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩ‰ø°ÊÅØ(Ë¥¶Êà∑=ÂØÜÁ†Å)

    [users]root=yubuntu0109

  3. ShiroTest.java : Ê®°ÊãüÈ™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØ(ÊääÊñ≠ÁÇπÊâìÂú®currentUser.login(token))

    package pers.huangyuhui;import org.apache.shiro.SecurityUtils;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.IncorrectCredentialsException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UnknownAccountException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UsernamePasswordToken;import org.apache.shiro.config.IniSecurityManagerFactory;import org.apache.shiro.mgt.SecurityManager;import org.apache.shiro.subject.Subject;import org.apache.shiro.util.Factory;import org.junit.Test;/** * ShiroËÆ§ËØÅÊµãËØï:È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØ */public class ShiroTest {    @Test    public void testLogin() {        //1:Âä†ËΩΩÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂,ÂàõÂª∫SecurityManagerÂ∑•ÂéÇÂØπË±°        Factory<SecurityManager> factory = new IniSecurityManagerFactory("classpath:shiro.ini");        //2:Ëé∑ÂæósecurityManagerÂÆû‰æãÂØπË±°        SecurityManager securityManager = factory.getInstance();        //3:Â∞ÜsecurityMangerÂÆû‰æãÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ÂΩìÂâçËøêË°åÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠,‰æø‰∫éËÆøÈóÆ        SecurityUtils.setSecurityManager(securityManager);        //4:ÂàõÂª∫ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁöÑ‰∏ª‰Ωì        Subject currentUser = SecurityUtils.getSubject();        //5:ÁªëÂÆö‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩïÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩ/Âá≠ËØÅ,Êó¢Ë¥¶Êà∑ÂèäÂØÜÁ†Å        UsernamePasswordToken token = new UsernamePasswordToken("root", "yubuntu0109");        //6:‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩï        try {            currentUser.login(token);            System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :" + currentUser.isAuthenticated());        } catch (UnknownAccountException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë¥¶Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (IncorrectCredentialsException e) {            System.err.println("Áî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†Å‰ø°ÊÅØÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (AuthenticationException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        //8:Ê≥®ÈîÄÁôªÂΩï        currentUser.logout();        System.out.println("Ë∫´‰ªΩË∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :" + !currentUser.isAuthenticated());    }}

  4. Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

    // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :true// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Ë∫´‰ªΩË∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :true

Ê°à‰æãÊ∫êÁ†ÅÊµÅÁ®ãÂõæ

Âú®ÂàÜÊûêÊ∫êÁ†Å‰πãÂâç,ÂÖàÁúã‰∏Ä‰∏ãËØ•Ê°à‰æãÁöÑÊ∫êÁ†ÅÊµÅÁ®ãÂõæÂêß,‰πü‰æø‰∫éÂêéÈù¢ÂØπÊ∫êÁ†ÅÂàÜÊûêÁöÑÁêÜËß£~

  1. Ë∞ÉÁî®subject.login(AuthenticationToken token)ÊñπÊ≥ïËøõË°åÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï,ÂÖ∂‰ºöËá™Âä®ÂßîÊâòÁªôsecurityManager.login(Subject subject, AuthenticationToken token)ÊñπÊ≥ïËøõË°åÁôªÂΩï
  2. securityManager(ÂÆâÂÖ®ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂô®)ÈÄöËøáAuthenticator(ËÆ§ËØÅÂô®)ËøõË°åËÆ§ËØÅ
  3. AuthenticatorÁöÑÂÆûÁé∞Á±ªModularRealmAuthenticatorÈÄöËøáË∞ÉÁî®realm‰ªéshiro.iniÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂‰∏≠Ëé∑ÂèñÁî®Êà∑ÁúüÂÆûÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØ(Ë¥¶Êà∑ÂíåÂØÜÁ†Å),ËøôÈáåÁöÑRealm(Âüü)ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÊàêDataSource,Âç≥ÂÆâÂÖ®Êï∞ÊçÆÊ∫ê
  4. IniRealm(ÂèØÈÄöËøáÂä†ËΩΩ.iniÊñá‰ª∂ÁîüÊàêreamlÂØπË±°)ÂÖàÊ†πÊçÆtoken‰∏≠ÁöÑË¥¶Âè∑Âéªshiro.iniÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂‰∏≠ÂéªÂåπÈÖçËØ•Ë¥¶Âè∑,Â¶ÇÊûúÊâæ‰∏çÂà∞ÂàôModularRealmAuthenticatorËøîÂõûnull,Â¶ÇÊûúÊâæÂà∞ÂàôÁªßÁª≠ÂåπÈÖçÂØÜÁ†Å,Ëã•ÂåπÈÖçÊàêÂäüÂàôËÆ§ËØÅÈÄöËøá,Âèç‰πã‰∏çÈÄöËøáÂìü~
  5. ÊúÄÂêéÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®Subject.logout()ËøõË°åÈÄÄÂá∫Êìç‰Ωú

Ê°à‰æãÊ∫êÁ†ÅÊµÅÁ®ãÂàÜÊûê

  1. ËøêË°å‰∏äËø∞Á®ãÂ∫è,È¶ñÂÖàdebug(Step into)ËøõÂÖ•currentUser.login(token)ÂÜÖÈÉ®,Êó¢DelegatingSubject.java. ‰ªéÊ∫êÁ†ÅÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂá∫ : ‰∏éSubjectÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ‰∫§‰∫íÈÉΩ‰ºöÂßîÊâòÁªôSecurityManager. ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääSubjectËÆ§‰∏∫ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Èó®Èù¢,SecurityManagerÊâçÊòØÂÆûÈôÖÁöÑÊâßË°åËÄÖÂìü~
    public void login(AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException {        this.clearRunAsIdentitiesInternal();        Subject subject = this.securityManager.login(this, token);        // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑

ÁªßÁª≠(Step into)ËøõÂÖ•this.securityManager.login(this, token);,Êó¢DefaultSecurityManager.java. Ê≠§Êó∂È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÁöÑÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÊ≠£ÂºèÂºÄÂßã

public Subject login(Subject subject, AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException {        AuthenticationInfo info;        try {            info = this.authenticate(token);        } catch (AuthenticationException var7) {        // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑

  1. ÁªßÁª≠(Step into)ËøõÂÖ•this.authenticate(token),Êó¢AuthenticatingSecurityManager.java. ‰ªéÊ∫êÁ†ÅÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂá∫SecurityManagerÂ∞ÜtokenÂßîÊâòÁªô‰∫ÜAuthenticator(ËÆ§ËØÅÂô®)ÂéªÊâßË°åÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÁöÑËÆ§ËØÅÊìç‰Ωú

    public AuthenticationInfo authenticate(AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException {        return this.authenticator.authenticate(token);    }

  2. ÁªßÁª≠(Step into)ËøõÂÖ•this.authenticator.authenticate(token),Êó¢AbstractAuthenticator.java. Áî±info = this.doAuthenticate(token);Ëé∑Âèñ‰∏Ä‰∏™AuthenticationInfoÂØπË±°

    public final AuthenticationInfo authenticate(AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException {       if (token == null) {           throw new IllegalArgumentException("Method argument (authentication token) cannot be null.");       } else {           log.trace("Authentication attempt received for token [{}]", token);           AuthenticationInfo info;           try {               info = this.doAuthenticate(token);               if (info == null) {                   String msg = "No account information found for authentication token [" + token + "] by this Authenticator instance.  Please check that it is configured correctly.";                   throw new AuthenticationException(msg);               }       // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑

  3. ÁªßÁª≠(Step into)ËøõÂÖ•info = this.doAuthenticate(token),Êó¢ModularRealmAuthenticator.java. ÁÑ∂Âêé‰ªéÁ≥ªÁªüÊâÄÂä†ËΩΩÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂ÊâÄÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑRealmsÁöÑÂÄº‰∏≠Ëé∑Âèñ(this.getRealms())‰∏Ä‰∏™realmsÂØπË±°,ËØ•ÂØπË±°‰∏≠ÂåÖÂê´‰∏Ä‰∏™usersÂ±ûÊÄß,ÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÂåÖÂê´ÁùÄÁî®Êà∑ÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩÂèäÂá≠ËØÅ‰ø°ÊÅØ,‰æãÂ¶ÇË¥¶Âè∑‰∏∫root,ÂØÜÁ†Å‰∏∫yubuntu0109ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØ

    protected AuthenticationInfo doAuthenticate(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken) throws AuthenticationException {       assertRealmsConfigured();       Collection<Realm> realms = getRealms();       if (realms.size() == 1) {           return doSingleRealmAuthentication(realms.iterator().next(), authenticationToken);       } else {           return doMultiRealmAuthentication(realms, authenticationToken);       }   }   // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑

ÁªßÁª≠(Step into)ËøõÂÖ•this.doSingleRealmAuthentication((Realm)realms.iterator().next(), authenticationToken). ÂèëÁé∞ÂÖ∂ÈÄöËøárealm.getAuthenticationInfo(token)Ëé∑Âèñ‰∏Ä‰∏™AuthenticationInfoÂØπË±°(ÂÖ∂‰∏≠Â≠òÂÇ®ÁùÄ‰ªéRealm‰∏≠Ëé∑ÂèñÁöÑÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩ‰ø°ÊÅØ)

protected AuthenticationInfo doSingleRealmAuthentication(Realm realm, AuthenticationToken token) {        if (!realm.supports(token)) {            String msg = "Realm [" + realm + "] does not support authentication token [" +                    token + "].  Please ensure that the appropriate Realm implementation is " +                    "configured correctly or that the realm accepts AuthenticationTokens of this type.";            throw new UnsupportedTokenException(msg);        }        AuthenticationInfo info = realm.getAuthenticationInfo(token);        if (info == null) {            String msg = "Realm [" + realm + "] was unable to find account data for the " +                    "submitted AuthenticationToken [" + token + "].";            throw new UnknownAccountException(msg);        }        return info;    }
  1. ÁªßÁª≠(Step into)ËøõÂÖ•realm.getAuthenticationInfo(token),Êó¢AuthenticatingRealm.java
    public final AuthenticationInfo getAuthenticationInfo(AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException {       AuthenticationInfo info = getCachedAuthenticationInfo(token);       if (info == null) {           //otherwise not cached, perform the lookup:           info = doGetAuthenticationInfo(token);           log.debug("Looked up AuthenticationInfo [{}] from doGetAuthenticationInfo", info);           if (token != null && info != null) {               cacheAuthenticationInfoIfPossible(token, info);           }       } else {           log.debug("Using cached authentication info [{}] to perform credentials matching.", info);       }       if (info != null) {           assertCredentialsMatch(token, info);       } else {           log.debug("No AuthenticationInfo found for submitted AuthenticationToken [{}].  Returning null.", token);       }       return info;   }   // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑

(Step into)ËøõÂÖ•doGetAuthenticationInfo(token),Êó¢SimpleAccountRealm.java. ÈÄöËøágetUser(upToken.getUsername())ËøõË°åÈ™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑Ë¥¶Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØ(Á®çÂêéÈ™åËØÅÂØÜÁ†Å‰ø°ÊÅØ),ÁÑ∂ÂêéËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™SimpleAccountÂØπË±°(account,Â¶Çroot),ÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÂåÖÂê´‰∫ÜÂá≠ËØÅ‰ø°ÊÅØ(credentials,Â¶Çyubuntu0109)

protected AuthenticationInfo doGetAuthenticationInfo(AuthenticationToken token) throws AuthenticationException {        UsernamePasswordToken upToken = (UsernamePasswordToken) token;        SimpleAccount account = getUser(upToken.getUsername());        if (account != null) {            if (account.isLocked()) {                throw new LockedAccountException("Account [" + account + "] is locked.");            }            if (account.isCredentialsExpired()) {                String msg = "The credentials for account [" + account + "] are expired";                throw new ExpiredCredentialsException(msg);            }        }        return account;    }    // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑

getUser(String username)ÁöÑÊ∫êÁ†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

protected SimpleAccount getUser(String username) {        USERS_LOCK.readLock().lock();        try {            return this.users.get(username);        } finally {            USERS_LOCK.readLock().unlock();        }    }    // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑

(step out)ÈÄÄÂá∫doGetAuthenticationInfo(AuthenticationToken token)ÊñπÊ≥ï,ÁÑ∂Âêé(step into)ËøõÂÖ•assertCredentialsMatch(token, info)ÊñπÊ≥ï,ÂÖ∂Â±û‰∫éAuthenticatingRealm.java. ÁªßËÄåÊâßË°åÈ™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†Å‰ø°ÊÅØÁöÑÊìç‰Ωú

protected void assertCredentialsMatch(AuthenticationToken token, AuthenticationInfo info) throws AuthenticationException {        CredentialsMatcher cm = getCredentialsMatcher();        if (cm != null) {            if (!cm.doCredentialsMatch(token, info)) {                //not successful - throw an exception to indicate this:                String msg = "Submitted credentials for token [" + token + "] did not match the expected credentials.";                throw new IncorrectCredentialsException(msg);            }        } else {            throw new AuthenticationException("A CredentialsMatcher must be configured in order to verify " +                    "credentials during authentication.  If you do not wish for credentials to be examined, you " +                    "can configure an " + AllowAllCredentialsMatcher.class.getName() + " instance.");        }    }

(step into)ËøõÂÖ•cm.doCredentialsMatch(token, info),ÂÖ∂Â±û‰∫éSimpleCredentialsMatcher.java. ËßÇÂØüShiroÊòØÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÈ™åËØÅÂØÜÁ†ÅÁöÑ : ÊØîËæÉAuthenticationToken(token)‰∏éAuthenticationInfo(info)‰∏≠ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÂØÜÁ†ÅÊòØÂê¶Áõ∏Âêå

public boolean doCredentialsMatch(AuthenticationToken token, AuthenticationInfo info) {        Object tokenCredentials = getCredentials(token);        Object accountCredentials = getCredentials(info);        return equals(tokenCredentials, accountCredentials);    }

entry.title: Hi Shiro ~
entry.content:
Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ : ÂàùËØÜShiro ~

ÁÆÄ‰ªã : Apache ShiroÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âº∫Â§ßÊòìÁî®ÁöÑJavaÂÆâÂÖ®Ê°ÜÊû∂,Êèê‰æõ‰∫ÜËÆ§ËØÅ„ÄÅÊéàÊùÉ„ÄÅÂä†ÂØÜÂíå‰ºöËØùÁÆ°ÁêÜÁ≠âÂäüËÉΩÔºåÂØπ‰∫é‰ªª‰Ωï‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∫îÁî®Á®ãÂ∫è,ShiroÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•Êèê‰æõÂÖ®Èù¢ÁöÑÂÆâÂÖ®ÁÆ°ÁêÜÊúçÂä°

ÊùÉÈôêÁÆ°ÁêÜÂåÖÊã¨Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩËÆ§ËØÅÂíåÊéàÊùÉ‰∏§‰∏™ÈÉ®ÂàÜ,ÁÆÄÁß∞ËÆ§ËØÅÊéàÊùÉ

  1. Ë∫´‰ªΩËÆ§ËØÅ : ‰∏∫Âà§Êñ≠Áî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫ÂêàÊ≥ïÁî®Êà∑ÁöÑËøáÁ®ã,ÊúÄÂ∏∏Áî®ÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩËÆ§ËØÅÊñπÂºèÂ∞±ÊòØÁ≥ªÁªüÈÄöËøáÊ†∏ÂØπÁî®Êà∑ËæìÂÖ•ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÂêçÂíåÂè£‰ª§,Â∞ÜÂÖ∂‰∏éÁ≥ªÁªü‰∏≠Â≠òÂÇ®ÁöÑËØ•Áî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÁõ∏ÂØπÊØî,ÁªßËÄåÊù•Âà§Êñ≠Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶Ê≠£Á°Æ
  2. ÊéàÊùÉ : Êó¢ËÆøÈóÆÊùÉÈôê,ÊéßÂà∂Áî®Êà∑ËÆøÈóÆËµÑÊ∫êÁöÑÊùÉÈôê. ‰∏ª‰Ωì(subject)ËøõË°åË∫´‰ªΩËÆ§ËØÅÂêéÈúÄË¶ÅÂàÜÈÖçÊùÉÈôêÊñπÂèØËÆøÈóÆÁ≥ªÁªüÁöÑËµÑÊ∫ê

Êû∂ÊûÑËß£Êûê

ShiroÂèØ‰ª•ÈùûÂ∏∏ÂÆπÊòìÁöÑÂºÄÂèëÂá∫Ë∂≥Â§üÂ•ΩÁöÑÂ∫îÁî®,ÂÖ∂‰∏ç‰ªÖÂèØ‰ª•Áî®Âú®JavaSEÁéØÂ¢É,‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Áî®Âú®JavaEEÁéØÂ¢É. ShiroÂèØ‰ª•Â∏ÆÂä©Êàë‰ª¨ÂÆåÊàê : ËÆ§ËØÅ„ÄÅÊéàÊùÉ„ÄÅÂä†ÂØÜ„ÄÅ‰ºöËØùÁÆ°ÁêÜ„ÄÅ‰∏éWebÈõÜÊàê„ÄÅÁºìÂ≠òÁ≠â. ÂÖ∂Âü∫Êú¨ÂäüËÉΩÁÇπÂèäÂÖ∂Ëß£ÊûêÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

  • Authentication : Ë∫´‰ªΩËÆ§ËØÅ / ÁôªÂΩï,È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÊòØ‰∏çÊòØÊã•ÊúâÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩ
  • Authorization : ÊéàÊùÉ,Âç≥ÊùÉÈôêÈ™åËØÅ,È™åËØÅÊüê‰∏™Â∑≤ËÆ§ËØÅÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÊüê‰∏™ÊùÉÈôê. Âç≥Âà§Êñ≠Áî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶ËÉΩÂÅö‰∫ãÊÉÖ,Â∏∏ËßÅÁöÑÂ¶Ç : È™åËØÅÊüê‰∏™Áî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶Êã•ÊúâÊüê‰∏™ËßíËâ≤,ÊàñËÄÖÁªÜÁ≤íÂ∫¶ÁöÑÈ™åËØÅÊüê‰∏™Áî®Êà∑ÂØπÊüê‰∏™ËµÑÊ∫êÊòØÂê¶ÂÖ∑ÊúâÊüê‰∏™ÊùÉÈôê
  • Session Manager : ‰ºöËØùÁÆ°ÁêÜ,Âç≥Áî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩïÂêéÂ∞±ÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨°‰ºöËØù,Âú®Ê≤°ÊúâÈÄÄÂá∫‰πãÂâç,ÂÆÉÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ‰ø°ÊÅØÈÉΩÂú®‰ºöËØù‰∏≠. ‰ºöËØùÂèØ‰ª•ÊòØÊôÆÈÄöJavaSEÁéØÂ¢ÉÁöÑ,‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÊòØÂ¶ÇWebÁéØÂ¢ÉÁöÑ
  • Cryptography : Âä†ÂØÜ,‰øùÊä§Êï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÂÆâÂÖ®ÊÄß,Â¶ÇÂØÜÁ†ÅÂä†ÂØÜÂ≠òÂÇ®Âà∞Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì,ËÄå‰∏çÊòØÊòéÊñáÂ≠òÂÇ®
  • Web Support : WebÊîØÊåÅ,ÂèØ‰ª•ÈùûÂ∏∏ÂÆπÊòìÁöÑÈõÜÊàêÂà∞WebÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠
  • Caching : ÁºìÂ≠ò,ÊØîÂ¶ÇÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩïÂêé,ÂÖ∂Áî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÅÊã•ÊúâÁöÑËßíËâ≤ / ÊùÉÈôê‰∏çÂøÖÊØèÊ¨°ÂéªÊü•,ËøôÊ†∑ÂèØ‰ª•ÊèêÈ´òÊïàÁéá
  • Concurrency : shiroÊîØÊåÅÂ§öÁ∫øÁ®ãÂ∫îÁî®ÁöÑÂπ∂ÂèëÈ™åËØÅ,Âç≥Â¶ÇÂú®‰∏Ä‰∏™Á∫øÁ®ã‰∏≠ÂºÄÂêØÂè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™Á∫øÁ®ã,ËÉΩÊääÊùÉÈôêËá™Âä®‰º†Êí≠ËøáÂéª
  • Testing : Êèê‰æõÊµãËØïÊîØÊåÅ
  • Run As : ÂÖÅËÆ∏‰∏Ä‰∏™Áî®Êà∑ÂÅáË£Ö‰∏∫Âè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™Áî®Êà∑(Âú®‰ªñ‰ª¨ÂÖÅËÆ∏ÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ã)ÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩËøõË°åËÆøÈóÆ
  • Remember Me : ËÆ∞‰ΩèÊàë,Ëøô‰∏™ÊòØÈùûÂ∏∏Â∏∏ËßÅÁöÑÂäüËÉΩ,Âç≥‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÁôªÂΩïÂêé,‰∏ãÊ¨°‰∏çÁî®ÈáçÂ§çÁôªÂΩï‰∫Ü

Â§ñÈÉ®ÁªìÊûÑ

Â§ñÈÉ®Êû∂ÊûÑÂõæ,Âç≥‰ªéÂ∫îÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èËßíÂ∫¶ÁöÑÊù•ËßÇÂØüÂ¶Ç‰Ωï‰ΩøÁî®ShiroÂÆåÊàêÂ∑•‰Ωú :

ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞,Â∫îÁî®‰ª£Á†ÅÁõ¥Êé•‰∫§‰∫íÁöÑÂØπË±°ÊòØSubject,‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØËØ¥ShiroÁöÑÂØπÂ§ñAPIÊ†∏ÂøÉÂ∞±ÊòØSubject. ÂÖ∂ÊØè‰∏™APIÁöÑÂê´‰πâÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

  • Subject : ‰∏ª‰Ωì,‰ª£Ë°®‰∫ÜÂΩìÂâç‚ÄùÁî®Êà∑‚Äù,Ëøô‰∏™Áî®Êà∑‰∏ç‰∏ÄÂÆöÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖ∑‰ΩìÁöÑ‰∫∫,‰∏éÂΩìÂâçÂ∫îÁî®‰∫§‰∫íÁöÑ‰ªª‰Ωï‰∏úË•øÈÉΩÊòØSubject,Â¶ÇÁΩëÁªúÁà¨Ëô´,Êú∫Âô®‰∫∫Á≠â,Âç≥‰∏∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊäΩË±°Ê¶ÇÂøµ. ÊâÄÊúâSubjectÈÉΩÁªëÂÆöÂà∞SecurityManager,‰∏éSubjectÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ‰∫§‰∫íÈÉΩ‰ºöÂßîÊâòÁªôSecurityManager. ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääSubjectËÆ§‰∏∫ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Èó®Èù¢,SecurityManagerÊâçÊòØÂÆûÈôÖÁöÑÊâßË°åËÄÖ
  • SecurityManager : ÂÆâÂÖ®ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂô®,Âç≥ÊâÄÊúâ‰∏éÂÆâÂÖ®ÊúâÂÖ≥ÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÈÉΩ‰ºö‰∏éSecurityManager‰∫§‰∫í,‰∏îÂÆÉÁÆ°ÁêÜÁùÄÊâÄÊúâSubject. ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂá∫ÂÆÉÊòØShiroÁöÑÊ†∏ÂøÉ,ÂÆÉË¥üË¥£‰∏éÂêéËæπ‰ªãÁªçÁöÑÂÖ∂‰ªñÁªÑ‰ª∂ËøõË°å‰∫§‰∫í,Â¶ÇÊûúÂ≠¶‰π†ËøáSpringMVC,‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääÂÆÉÁúãÊàêDispatcherServletÂâçÁ´ØÊéßÂà∂Âô®
  • Realm : Âüü,Shiro‰ªéRealmËé∑ÂèñÂÆâÂÖ®Êï∞ÊçÆ(Â¶ÇÁî®Êà∑„ÄÅËßíËâ≤„ÄÅÊùÉÈôê),Â∞±ÊòØËØ¥SecurityManagerË¶ÅÈ™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩ,ÈÇ£‰πàÂÆÉÈúÄË¶Å‰ªéRealmËé∑ÂèñÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ËøõË°åÊØîËæÉ‰ª•Á°ÆÂÆöÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶ÂêàÊ≥ï,‰πüÈúÄË¶Å‰ªéRealmÂæóÂà∞Áî®Êà∑Áõ∏Â∫îÁöÑËßíËâ≤ / ÊùÉÈôêËøõË°åÈ™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÊòØÂê¶ËÉΩËøõË°åÊìç‰Ωú. ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääRealmÁúãÊàê DataSource,Âç≥ÂÆâÂÖ®Êï∞ÊçÆÊ∫ê

‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØËØ¥,ÊúÄÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ShiroÂ∫îÁî®ÂèØ‰ª•Âü∫Êú¨ÂàÜ‰∏∫‰ª•‰∏ã‰∏§‰∏™Ê≠•È™§ :

  1. Â∫îÁî®‰ª£Á†ÅÈÄöËøáSubjectÊù•ËøõË°åËÆ§ËØÅÂíåÊéàÊùÉ,ËÄåSubjectÂèàÂ∞ÜÊâÄÊúâÁöÑ‰∫í‰∫§ÈÉΩÂßîÊâòÁªô‰∫ÜSecurityManager
  2. Êàë‰ª¨ÈúÄË¶ÅÁªôShiroÁöÑSecurityManagerÊ≥®ÂÖ•Realm,‰ªéËÄåËÆ©SecurityManagerËÉΩÂæóÂà∞ÂêàÊ≥ïÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÂèäÂÖ∂ÊùÉÈôêËøõË°åÂà§Êñ≠

‰ªé‰ª•‰∏ä‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂá∫,Shiro‰∏çÊèê‰æõÁª¥Êä§Áî®Êà∑ / ÊùÉÈôê,ËÄåÊòØÈÄöËøáRealmËÆ©ÂºÄÂèë‰∫∫ÂëòËá™Â∑±Ê≥®ÂÖ•

ÂÜÖÈÉ®ÁªìÊûÑ

Êé•‰∏ãÊù•Êàë‰ª¨Êù•‰ªéShiroÂÜÖÈÉ®Êù•Áúã‰∏ãShiroÁöÑÊû∂ÊûÑ,Â¶Ç‰∏ãÂõæÊâÄÁ§∫ :

  • Subject : ‰∏ª‰Ωì,ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞‰∏ª‰ΩìÂèØ‰ª•ÊòØ‰ªª‰ΩïÂèØ‰ª•‰∏éÂ∫îÁî®‰∫§‰∫íÁöÑ‚ÄùÁî®Êà∑‚Äù
  • SecurityManager : Áõ∏ÂΩì‰∫éSpringMVC‰∏≠ÁöÑDispatcherServletÊàñStruts2‰∏≠ÁöÑFilterDispatcher; ÊòØShiroÁöÑÂøÉËÑè. ÊâÄÊúâÂÖ∑‰ΩìÁöÑ‰∫§‰∫íÈÉΩÈÄöËøáSecurityManagerËøõË°åÊéßÂà∂,ÂÆÉÁÆ°ÁêÜÁùÄÊâÄÊúâSubject„ÄÅ‰∏îË¥üË¥£ËøõË°åËÆ§ËØÅÂíåÊéàÊùÉ„ÄÅÂèä‰ºöËØù„ÄÅÁºìÂ≠òÁöÑÁÆ°ÁêÜ
  • Authenticator : ËÆ§ËØÅÂô®,Ë¥üË¥£‰∏ª‰ΩìËÆ§ËØÅÁöÑ,ËøôÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Êâ©Â±ïÁÇπ,Â¶ÇÊûúÁî®Êà∑ËßâÂæóShiroÈªòËÆ§ÁöÑ‰∏çÂ•Ω,ÂèØ‰ª•Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÂÆûÁé∞. ÂÖ∂ÈúÄË¶ÅËÆ§ËØÅÁ≠ñÁï•(Authentication Strategy),Âç≥‰ªÄ‰πàÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ãÁÆóÁî®Êà∑ËÆ§ËØÅÈÄöËøá‰∫Ü
  • Authrizer : ÊéàÊùÉÂô®,ÊàñËÄÖËÆøÈóÆÊéßÂà∂Âô®,Áî®Êù•ÂÜ≥ÂÆö‰∏ª‰ΩìÊòØÂê¶ÊúâÊùÉÈôêËøõË°åÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑÊìç‰Ωú,Âç≥ÊéßÂà∂ÁùÄÁî®Êà∑ËÉΩËÆøÈóÆÂ∫îÁî®‰∏≠ÁöÑÂì™‰∫õÂäüËÉΩ
  • Realm : ÂèØ‰ª•Êúâ1‰∏™ÊàñÂ§ö‰∏™Realm,ÂèØ‰ª•ËÆ§‰∏∫ÊòØÂÆâÂÖ®ÂÆû‰ΩìÊï∞ÊçÆÊ∫ê,Âç≥Áî®‰∫éËé∑ÂèñÂÆâÂÖ®ÂÆû‰Ωì. ÂèØ‰ª•ÊòØJDBCÂÆûÁé∞,‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÊòØLDAPÂÆûÁé∞,ÊàñËÄÖÂÜÖÂ≠òÂÆûÁé∞Á≠â,Áî±Áî®Êà∑Êèê‰æõ. Ê≥®ÊÑè : Shiro‰∏çÁü•ÈÅì‰Ω†ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ / ÊùÉÈôêÂ≠òÂÇ®Âú®Âì™Âèä‰ª•‰ΩïÁßçÊ†ºÂºèÂ≠òÂÇ®,ÊâÄ‰ª•Êàë‰ª¨‰∏ÄËà¨Âú®Â∫îÁî®‰∏≠ÈÉΩÈúÄË¶ÅÂÆûÁé∞Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑRealm
  • SessionManager : Â¶ÇÊûúÂÜôËøáServletÂ∞±Â∫îËØ•Áü•ÈÅìSessionÁöÑÊ¶ÇÂøµ,SessionÈúÄË¶ÅÊúâ‰∫∫ÂéªÁÆ°ÁêÜÂÆÉÁöÑÁîüÂëΩÂë®Êúü,Ëøô‰∏™ÁªÑ‰ª∂Â∞±ÊòØSessionManager,ËÄåShiroÂπ∂‰∏ç‰ªÖ‰ªÖÂèØ‰ª•Áî®Âú®WebÁéØÂ¢É,‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Áî®Âú®Â¶ÇÊôÆÈÄöÁöÑJavaSEÁéØÂ¢É„ÄÅEJBÁ≠âÁéØÂ¢É. ÊâÄ‰ª•ShiroÂ∞±ÊäΩË±°‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑSessionÊù•ÁÆ°ÁêÜ‰∏ª‰Ωì‰∏éÂ∫îÁî®‰πãÈó¥‰∫§‰∫íÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ. ËøôÊ†∑ÁöÑËØù,ÊØîÂ¶ÇÊàë‰ª¨Âú®WebÁéØÂ¢ÉÁî®,ÂàöÂºÄÂßãÊòØ‰∏ÄÂè∞WebÊúçÂä°Âô®,Êé•ÁùÄÂèà‰∏ä‰∫ÜÂè∞EJBÊúçÂä°Âô®,ËøôÊó∂ÊÉ≥Êää‰∏§Âè∞ÊúçÂä°Âô®ÁöÑ‰ºöËØùÊï∞ÊçÆÊîæÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Âú∞Êñπ,Ëøô‰∏™Êó∂ÂÄôÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÂÆûÁé∞Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂàÜÂ∏ÉÂºè‰ºöËØù(Â¶ÇÊääÊï∞ÊçÆÊîæÂà∞MemcachedÊúçÂä°Âô®)
  • SessionDAO : DAOÂ§ßÂÆ∂ÈÉΩÁî®Ëøá,Êï∞ÊçÆËÆøÈóÆÂØπË±°,Áî®‰∫é‰ºöËØùÁöÑCRUD,ÊØîÂ¶ÇÊàë‰ª¨ÊÉ≥ÊääSession‰øùÂ≠òÂà∞Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì,ÈÇ£‰πàÂèØ‰ª•ÂÆûÁé∞Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑ SessionDAO,ÈÄöËøáÂ¶ÇJDBCÂÜôÂà∞Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì. ÊØîÂ¶ÇÊÉ≥ÊääSessionÊîæÂà∞Memcached‰∏≠,ÂèØ‰ª•ÂÆûÁé∞Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑMemcached SessionDAO. Âè¶Â§ñSessionDAO‰∏≠ÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®CacheËøõË°åÁºìÂ≠ò,‰ª•ÊèêÈ´òÊÄßËÉΩ
  • CacheManager : ÁºìÂ≠òÊéßÂà∂Âô®,Êù•ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂ¶ÇÁî®Êà∑„ÄÅËßíËâ≤„ÄÅÊùÉÈôêÁ≠âÁöÑÁºìÂ≠òÁöÑ. Âõ†‰∏∫Ëøô‰∫õÊï∞ÊçÆÂü∫Êú¨‰∏äÂæàÂ∞ëÂéªÊîπÂèò,ÊîæÂà∞ÁºìÂ≠ò‰∏≠ÂêéÂèØ‰ª•ÊèêÈ´òËÆøÈóÆÁöÑÊÄßËÉΩ
  • Cryptography : ÂØÜÁ†ÅÊ®°Âùó,ShiroÊèêÈ´ò‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∫õÂ∏∏ËßÅÁöÑÂä†ÂØÜÁªÑ‰ª∂Áî®‰∫éÂ¶ÇÂØÜÁ†ÅÂä†ÂØÜ / Ëß£ÂØÜ

Ê°à‰æã

Á¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ShiroÁ®ãÂ∫è

Êé•‰∏ãÊù•ÈÄöËøá‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÁî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÈ™åËØÅÁ®ãÂ∫è,Êù•ÊÑüÂèó‰∏Ä‰∏ãShiroÁöÑÈ≠ÖÂäõÂêß !

  1. pom.xml : Maven‰æùËµñ

    <dependencies>    <dependency>        <groupId>junit</groupId>        <artifactId>junit</artifactId>        <version>4.11</version>        <scope>test</scope>    </dependency>    <!-- ShiroÊ†∏ÂøÉÂåÖ -->    <dependency>        <groupId>org.apache.shiro</groupId>        <artifactId>shiro-core</artifactId>        <version>1.3.2</version>    </dependency>    <!-- slf4jÁöÑÊé•Âè£ÂÆûÁé∞ -->    <dependency>        <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>        <artifactId>slf4j-log4j12</artifactId>        <version>1.7.12</version>    </dependency></dependencies>

  2. log4j.properties : Êó•ÂøóÈÖçÁΩÆ‰ø°ÊÅØ

    log4j.rootLogger=INFO, stdoutlog4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppenderlog4j.appender.stdout.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayoutlog4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern=%d %p [%c] - %m %n# General Apache librarieslog4j.logger.org.apache=WARN# Springlog4j.logger.org.springframework=WARN# Default Shiro logginglog4j.logger.org.apache.shiro=TRACE# Disable verbose logginglog4j.logger.org.apache.shiro.util.ThreadContext=WARNlog4j.logger.org.apache.shiro.cache.ehcache.EhCache=WARN

  3. shiro.ini : Â≠òÂÇ®Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩ‰ø°ÊÅØ(Ë¥¶Êà∑=ÂØÜÁ†Å)

    [users]root=yubuntu0109

  4. ShiroTest.java : È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØ

    package pers.huangyuhui;import org.apache.shiro.SecurityUtils;import org.apache.shiro.authc.AuthenticationException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.IncorrectCredentialsException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UnknownAccountException;import org.apache.shiro.authc.UsernamePasswordToken;import org.apache.shiro.config.IniSecurityManagerFactory;import org.apache.shiro.mgt.SecurityManager;import org.apache.shiro.subject.Subject;import org.apache.shiro.util.Factory;import org.junit.Test;/** * ShiroËÆ§ËØÅÊµãËØï:È™åËØÅÁî®Êà∑ÁôªÂΩï‰ø°ÊÅØ */public class ShiroTest {    @Test    public void testLogin() {        //1:Âä†ËΩΩÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂,ÂàõÂª∫SecurityManagerÂ∑•ÂéÇÂØπË±°        Factory<SecurityManager> factory = new IniSecurityManagerFactory("classpath:shiro.ini");        //2:Ëé∑ÂæósecurityManagerÂÆû‰æãÂØπË±°        SecurityManager securityManager = factory.getInstance();        //3:Â∞ÜsecurityMangerÂÆû‰æãÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ÂΩìÂâçËøêË°åÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠,‰æø‰∫éËÆøÈóÆ        SecurityUtils.setSecurityManager(securityManager);        //4:ÂàõÂª∫ÂΩìÂâçÁôªÂΩïÁöÑ‰∏ª‰Ωì        Subject currentUser = SecurityUtils.getSubject();        //5:ÁªëÂÆö‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩïÁöÑË∫´‰ªΩ/Âá≠ËØÅ,Êó¢Ë¥¶Êà∑ÂèäÂØÜÁ†Å        UsernamePasswordToken token = new UsernamePasswordToken("root", "yubuntu0109");        //6:‰∏ª‰ΩìÁôªÂΩï        try {            currentUser.login(token);            System.out.println("Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :" + currentUser.isAuthenticated());        } catch (UnknownAccountException e) {            System.err.println("Ë¥¶Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (IncorrectCredentialsException e) {            System.err.println("ÂØÜÁ†Å‰ø°ÊÅØÈîôËØØ !");        } catch (AuthenticationException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        //8:Ê≥®ÈîÄÁôªÂΩï        currentUser.logout();        System.out.println("Ë∫´‰ªΩË∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :" + !currentUser.isAuthenticated());    }}

  5. Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÁªìÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

    // ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Áî®Êà∑Ë∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶È™åËØÅÊàêÂäü :true// ¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑¬∑Ë∫´‰ªΩË∫´‰ªΩÊòØÂê¶Ê≥®ÈîÄÊàêÂäü :true

ÂÆòÊñπÂÖ•Èó®Ê°à‰æã

  1. pom.xml : Maven‰æùËµñ(Âêå‰∏ä)

  2. log4.properties : Êó•ÂøóÈÖçÁΩÆ‰ø°ÊÅØ(Âêå‰∏ä)

  3. shiro.ini : Â≠òÂÇ®ÂÖ∑ÊúâÊåáÂÆöÊùÉÈôêÁöÑ,‰∏çÂêåË∫´‰ªΩÁöÑÁî®Êà∑‰ø°ÊÅØ

    # =============================================================================# Quickstart INI Realm configuration## For those that might not understand the references in this file, the# definitions are all based on the classic Mel Brooks' film "Spaceballs". ;)# =============================================================================# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------# Users and their assigned roles## Each line conforms to the format defined in the# org.apache.shiro.realm.text.TextConfigurationRealm#setUserDefinitions JavaDoc# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------[users]# user 'root' with password 'secret' and the 'admin' roleroot = secret, admin# user 'guest' with the password 'guest' and the 'guest' roleguest = guest, guest# user 'presidentskroob' with password '12345' ("That's the same combination on# my luggage!!!" ;)), and role 'president'presidentskroob = 12345, president# user 'darkhelmet' with password 'ludicrousspeed' and roles 'darklord' and 'schwartz'darkhelmet = ludicrousspeed, darklord, schwartz# user 'lonestarr' with password 'vespa' and roles 'goodguy' and 'schwartz'lonestarr = vespa, goodguy, schwartz# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------# Roles with assigned permissions# # Each line conforms to the format defined in the# org.apache.shiro.realm.text.TextConfigurationRealm#setRoleDefinitions JavaDoc# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------[roles]# 'admin' role has all permissions, indicated by the wildcard '*'admin = *# The 'schwartz' role can do anything (*) with any lightsaber:schwartz = lightsaber:*# The 'goodguy' role is allowed to 'drive' (action) the winnebago (type) with# license plate 'eagle5' (instance specific id)goodguy = winnebago:drive:eagle5

  4. Quickstart.java : ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÂÖ•Èó®Á∫ßÁ®ãÂ∫è,Êïô‰Ω†Â¶Ç‰Ωï‰ΩøÁî®ShiroÁöÑAPI

    package pers.huangyuhui;import org.apache.shiro.SecurityUtils;import org.apache.shiro.authc.*;import org.apache.shiro.config.IniSecurityManagerFactory;import org.apache.shiro.mgt.SecurityManager;import org.apache.shiro.session.Session;import org.apache.shiro.subject.Subject;import org.apache.shiro.util.Factory;import org.slf4j.Logger;import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;/** * Simple Quickstart application showing how to use Shiro's API. * * @since 0.9 RC2 */public class Quickstart {    private static final transient Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Quickstart.class);    public static void main(String[] args) {        // The easiest way to create a Shiro SecurityManager with configured        // realms, users, roles and permissions is to use the simple INI config.        // We'll do that by using a factory that can ingest a .ini file and        // return a SecurityManager instance:        // Use the shiro.ini file at the root of the classpath        // (file: and url: prefixes load from files and urls respectively):        Factory<SecurityManager> factory = new IniSecurityManagerFactory("classpath:shiro.ini");        SecurityManager securityManager = factory.getInstance();        // for this simple example quickstart, make the SecurityManager        // accessible as a JVM singleton.  Most applications wouldn't do this        // and instead rely on their container configuration or web.xml for        // webapps.  That is outside the scope of this simple quickstart, so        // we'll just do the bare minimum so you can continue to get a feel        // for things.        SecurityUtils.setSecurityManager(securityManager);        // Now that a simple Shiro environment is set up, let's see what you can do:        // get the currently executing user:        Subject currentUser = SecurityUtils.getSubject();        // Do some stuff with a Session (no need for a web or EJB container!!!)        Session session = currentUser.getSession();        session.setAttribute("someKey", "aValue");        String value = (String) session.getAttribute("someKey");        if (value.equals("aValue")) {            log.info("Retrieved the correct value! [" + value + "]");        }        // let's login the current user so we can check against roles and permissions:        if (!currentUser.isAuthenticated()) {            UsernamePasswordToken token = new UsernamePasswordToken("lonestarr", "vespa");            token.setRememberMe(true);            try {                currentUser.login(token);            } catch (UnknownAccountException uae) {                log.info("There is no user with username of " + token.getPrincipal());            } catch (IncorrectCredentialsException ice) {                log.info("Password for account " + token.getPrincipal() + " was incorrect!");            } catch (LockedAccountException lae) {                log.info("The account for username " + token.getPrincipal() + " is locked.  " +                        "Please contact your administrator to unlock it.");            }            // ... catch more exceptions here (maybe custom ones specific to your application?            catch (AuthenticationException ae) {                //unexpected condition?  error?            }        }        //say who they are:        //print their identifying principal (in this case, a username):        log.info("User [" + currentUser.getPrincipal() + "] logged in successfully.");        //test a role:        if (currentUser.hasRole("schwartz")) {            log.info("May the Schwartz be with you!");        } else {            log.info("Hello, mere mortal.");        }        //test a typed permission (not instance-level)        if (currentUser.isPermitted("lightsaber:wield")) {            log.info("You may use a lightsaber ring.  Use it wisely.");        } else {            log.info("Sorry, lightsaber rings are for schwartz masters only.");        }        //a (very powerful) Instance Level permission:        if (currentUser.isPermitted("winnebago:drive:eagle5")) {            log.info("You are permitted to 'drive' the winnebago with license plate (id) 'eagle5'.  " +                    "Here are the keys - have fun!");        } else {            log.info("Sorry, you aren't allowed to drive the 'eagle5' winnebago!");        }        //all done - log out!        currentUser.logout();        System.exit(0);    }}

entry.title: How to create a pull request from a fork
entry.content:
Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ : Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂú®forkÁöÑ‰ªìÂ∫ì‰∏≠ÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™pull requestËØ∑Ê±Ç

Â¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†ÂàõÂª∫‰∫Ü‰ªìÂ∫ìÁöÑÂàÜÂèâÂπ∂ÂØπÂàÜÂèâËøõË°å‰∫ÜÊõ¥Êîπ,‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊãâÂèñËØ∑Ê±ÇÊù•ËØ∑Ê±Ç‰∏äÊ∏∏‰ªìÂ∫ìÊé•Âèó‰Ω†ÁöÑÊõ¥Êîπ. Ëá≥‰∫éËØ¥Â¶Ç‰ΩïÊ≠£Á°Æ‰ΩøÁî®ÂàÜÊîØËØ∑ÂèÇÈòÖÂÆòÊñπÊñáÊ°£ : https://help.github.com/en/articles/working-with-forks

ËØ¶ÁªÜÊ≠•È™§

  1. ÂØºËà™Âà∞‰ªéÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÂàõÂª∫ÂàÜÂèâÁöÑÂéüÂßã‰ªìÂ∫ì
  1. Âú®Branch(ÂàÜÊîØ)ËèúÂçïÁöÑÂè≥‰æß,ÂçïÂáªNew pull request(Êñ∞Âª∫ÊãâÂèñËØ∑Ê±Ç)

  1. Âú®Compare(ÊØîËæÉ)È°µÈù¢‰∏ä,ÂçïÂáªcompare across forks(Ë∑®ÂàÜÂèâÊØîËæÉ)

  1. Á°ÆËÆ§Âü∫Êú¨ÂàÜÂèâÊòØÊÇ®Ë¶ÅÂêëÂÖ∂ÂêàÂπ∂Êõ¥ÊîπÁöÑ‰ªìÂ∫ì. ‰ΩøÁî®base branch(Âü∫Êú¨ÂàÜÊîØ)‰∏ãÊãâËèúÂçï,ÈÄâÊã©Ë¶ÅÂêëÂÖ∂ÂêàÂπ∂Êõ¥ÊîπÁöÑ‰∏äÊ∏∏‰ªìÂ∫ìÂàÜÊîØ

  1. ‰ΩøÁî®head fork(Â§¥ÈÉ®ÂàÜÂèâ)‰∏ãÊãâËèúÂçïÈÄâÊã©ÊÇ®ÁöÑÂàÜÂèâ,ÁÑ∂Âêé‰ΩøÁî®compare branch(ÊØîËæÉÂàÜÊîØ)‰∏ãÊãâËèúÂçïÈÄâÊã©ËøõË°å‰∫ÜÊõ¥ÊîπÁöÑÂàÜÊîØ

  1. ÈîÆÂÖ•ÊãâÂèñËØ∑Ê±ÇÁöÑÊ†áÈ¢òÂíåËØ¥Êòé

  1. Â¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®‰∏çÂ∏åÊúõÂØπ‰∏äÊ∏∏‰ªìÂ∫ìÂÖ∑ÊúâÊé®ÈÄÅÊùÉÈôêÁöÑ‰ªª‰Ωï‰∫∫Êõ¥ÊîπÊÇ®ÁöÑÊãâÂèñËØ∑Ê±Ç,ËØ∑ÂèñÊ∂àÈÄâ‰∏≠Allow edits from maintainers(ÂÖÅËÆ∏Áª¥Êä§ÂëòÁºñËæë)

  1. Ë¶ÅÂàõÂª∫ÂèØ‰æõÂÆ°Êü•ÁöÑÊãâÂèñËØ∑Ê±Ç,ËØ∑ÂçïÂáª Create Pull Request(ÂàõÂª∫ÊãâÂèñËØ∑Ê±Ç). Ë¶ÅÂàõÂª∫ÊãâÂèñËØ∑Ê±ÇËçâÁ®ø,ËØ∑‰ΩøÁî®‰∏ãÊãâËèúÂçïÈÄâÊã©Create Draft Pull Request(ÂàõÂª∫ÊãâÂèñËØ∑Ê±ÇËçâÁ®ø),ÁÑ∂ÂêéÂçïÂáªDraft Pull Request(ÊãâÂèñËØ∑Ê±ÇËçâÁ®ø)

  • üëç ÊëòËá™GiHubÂ∏ÆÂä©ÊñáÊ°£(Êé®ËçêÂ∞ÜÂÖ∂‰Ωú‰∏∫GitHubÂ≠¶‰π†ÂèÇËÄÉ,ÂÜÖÂÆπÁúüÂøÉË∂ÖÁ∫ßËØ¶ÁªÜÂìü ~) : https://help.github.com/en

entry.title: A simple comment component for Vue
entry.content:
Ê°à‰æãÁ¨îËÆ∞ : ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑVueËØÑËÆ∫Ê°ÜÁªÑ‰ª∂

Âú®ÂÜôÂÆåÊ°à‰æã : ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âü∫‰∫éVue.jsÁöÑÁÆÄÂçï‰ø°ÊÅØÁÆ°ÁêÜÈ°µÂêé,Â∞èÂì•ÂèàÂàùÊ≠•Â≠¶‰π†‰∫ÜVue.jsÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÂÆö‰πâÂèäÂü∫Êú¨Áî®Ê≥ï,Êù•‰∏∫Ê≠§ÂÜçÂÜô‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∞èÊÄªÁªìÊ°à‰æãÂêß~ ËøôÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑËØÑËÆ∫Ê°ÜÁªÑ‰ª∂ : ÂèëË°®ËØÑËÆ∫(Â∞ÜÂÖ∂Â≠òÂÇ®Âà∞Local Storage)~ ËØ•Á®ãÂ∫èÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÁâàÊú¨ËßÅ : https://github.com/YUbuntu0109/vue-learning

(simple component for comment v1.0/comment-component-1.0.html)Á®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

<!DOCTYPE html><html><head><meta charset="utf-8"><script src="../../resources/vue.js"></script><link rel="stylesheet" href="../../resources/bootstrap.css" /><title>the comment component v.10</title></head><body><div id="app"><!-- use the comment component --><comm-component @fun-init="initComments" @fun-clear="clearLocalStorage"></comm-component><!-- comments --><ul class="list-group"><li class="list-group-item" v-for="comment in comments" :key="comment.id"><span class="badge">commenter : {{comment.commenter}}</span>contents : {{comment.content}}</li></ul></div><!-- the template of the component --><template id="commTemplate"><div class="panel panel-primary"><div class="panel-heading"><h3 class="panel-title">A SIMPLE COMMENT COMPONENT FOR VUE</h3></div><div class="panel-body form-inline"><div class="form-group"><label class="label label-default" style="font-size: 17px;">commenter</label><input type="text" class="form-control" style="width: 180px;" v-model="commenter" v-focus v-color="'#777'" /></div><div class="form-group" style="padding-left: 15px;"><label class="label label-default" style="font-size: 17px;">content</label><input type="text" class="form-control" style="width: 500px;" v-model="content" v-color="'#777'" @keyup.enter="commit" /></div><label style="padding-left: 5px;"><button class="btn btn-success" @click="commit">COMMIT</button><button class="btn btn-warning" style="margin-left: 10px;" @click="reset">RESET</button><button class="btn btn-danger" style="margin-left: 10px;" @click="delAll">CLEAR STORAGE</button></label></div></div></template><script>//declare the comment componentvar commComponent = {template: '#commTemplate',data() {return {commenter: '',content: ''}},methods: {commit() {var comment = {id: Date.now(),commenter: this.commenter,content: this.content}var commentList = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cmts') || '[]') //get all of comments from the local storagecommentList.unshift(comment)localStorage.setItem('cmts', JSON.stringify(commentList)) //save the new comment listthis.$emit('fun-init')this.commenter = ''this.content = ''},reset() {this.commenter = ''this.content = ''},delAll() {this.$emit('fun-clear')this.$emit('fun-init')}}}//custom directiveVue.directive('focus', {inserted: function(el) {el.focus()}});Vue.directive('color', {bind: function(el, colorStr) {el.style.color = colorStr.value}});var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {idStr: [],comments: [{id: '',commenter: '',content: ''}]},methods: {//initializes the list of comments on the pageinitComments() {var commentList = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cmts') || '[]')this.comments = commentList},//delete all of comments from the local storageclearLocalStorage() {localStorage.clear()}},components: {commComponent},created() {this.initComments() //(reflush)reload comments}});</script></body></html>

Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÂõæÊâÄÁ§∫ :

entry.title: ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âü∫‰∫éVueÁöÑÁÆÄÂçï‰ø°ÊÅØÁÆ°ÁêÜÈ°µ
entry.content:
Ê°à‰æãÁ¨îËÆ∞ : ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âü∫‰∫éVue.jsÁöÑÁÆÄÂçï‰ø°ÊÅØÁÆ°ÁêÜÈ°µ

ÂàùÊ≠•Â≠¶‰π†ÂÆåVue.jsÁöÑÂü∫Êú¨ËØ≠Ê≥ï„ÄÅÊï∞ÊçÆÁªëÂÆöËßÜÂõæÊú∫Âà∂„ÄÅ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁªëÂÆö„ÄÅËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåá‰ª§„ÄÅËøáÊª§Âô®Âêé,Êù•Â∞ùËØïÂÜô‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊÄªÁªìÊ°à‰æãÂêß~ ËØ•Ê°à‰æãÁöÑ‰∏ªË¶ÅÂäüËÉΩÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØÁÆ°ÁêÜ : Â¢ûÂä†,Âà†Èô§,Êü•Êâæ. ËØ•Á®ãÂ∫èÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÁâàÊú¨ËßÅ : https://github.com/YUbuntu0109/vue-learning

(simple demo program v1.2/demo-1.2.html)Á®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫ :

<!DOCTYPE html><html><head><meta charset="utf-8"><script src="../vue.js"></script><link rel="stylesheet" href="../simple%20demo%20program%20v1.0/resources/bootstrap.css" /><title>a simple demo program v1.2</title></head><body><div id="app"><div class="panel panel-primary"><div class="panel-heading"><h3 class="panel-title">SIMPLE DEMO PROGRAM FOR VUE</h3></div><div class="panel-body form-inline"><label>ID : <input type="text" class="form-control" v-model="id" /></label><label style="padding-left: 20px;">NAME : <input type="text" class="form-control" v-model="name" @keyup.enter="add()" /></label><label><button class="btn btn-primary" style="margin-left:20px ;" @click="add()">ADD</button></label><label style="padding-left: 213px;"><button class="btn btn-info">SEARCH BY NAME</button><input type="text" class="form-control" v-model="keyword" v-focus v-color="'blueviolet'" /></label></div></div><table class="table table-bordered table-hover table-striped"><thead><tr class="success"><th>ID</th><th>NAME</th><th style="width: 328px;">CTIME</th><th>OPERATION</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr v-for="user in search(keyword)" v-bind:key="user.id"><td>{{user.id}}</td><td>{{user.name}}</td><td>{{user.ctime | dateStrFilter('')}}</td><td><button class="btn btn-danger" @click="del(user.id)">DELETE</buttom></td></tr></tbody></table></div><script>Vue.filter('dateStrFilter', function(dateStr, datePattern = "") { //the default is nullvar newDateStr = new Date(dateStr)var year = newDateStr.getFullYear()var month = (newDateStr.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0') //padStart():complete the length of the stringvar date = newDateStr.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0')var hour = newDateStr.getHours().toString().padStart(2, '0')var m = newDateStr.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0')var s = newDateStr.getSeconds().toString().padStart(2, '0')if (datePattern.toLowerCase() === 'yyyy-mm-dd') {return `${year}-${month}-${date}`} else {return `${year}-${month}-${date} ${hour}:${m}:${s}`}});Vue.directive('focus', {inserted: function(el) {el.focus()}});Vue.directive('color', {bind: function(el, colorStr) {el.style.color = colorStr.value}});var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {id: '',name: '',keyword: '',users: [{id: 1,name: 'YUHUI001',ctime: new Date()},{id: 2,name: 'YUHUI002',ctime: new Date()},{id: 3,name: 'YUHUI003',ctime: new Date()}]},methods: {add() {var user = {id: this.id,name: this.name,ctime: new Date()}//The elements to add to the end of the array. this.users.push(user)this.id = this.name = ''},del(id) {var index = this.users.findIndex(user => {if (user.id == id) {return true;}});//The elements to add to the array.//If you don't specify any elements, splice simply removes elements from the array. this.users.splice(index, 1)},search(keyword) {var newUsers = []this.users.forEach(user => {//If the keyword is null, it returns 0.if (user.name.indexOf(keyword) != -1) {newUsers.push(user)}});return newUsers;}}});</script></body></html>

Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÊïàÊûúÁ§∫‰æãÂõæÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

entry.title: VueÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÂÆö‰πâÂèäÂü∫Êú¨Áî®Ê≥ï
entry.content:
Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ : VueÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÂÆö‰πâÂèäÂü∫Êú¨ÁöÑ‰ΩøÁî®ÊñπÊ≥ï

ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÂá∫Áé∞,ÊòØ‰∏∫‰∫ÜÊãÜÂàÜÂÆû‰æãÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÈáèÁöÑ,ÁªßËÄåËÉΩÂ§üËÆ©Êàë‰ª¨‰ª•‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂Êù•ÂàíÂàÜ‰∏çÂêåÂäüËÉΩÊ®°Âùó. ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÊòØÂèØÂ§çÁî®ÁöÑVueÂÆû‰æã,ÊâÄ‰ª•ÂÆÉ‰ª¨‰∏énew VueÊé•Êî∂Áõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÈÄâÈ°π,‰æãÂ¶Ç data„ÄÅcomputed„ÄÅwatch„ÄÅmethods‰ª•ÂèäÁîüÂëΩÂë®ÊúüÈí©Â≠êÁ≠â ..

  • ÁªÑ‰ª∂Âåñ : ‰ªé‰ª£Á†ÅÈÄªËæëÁöÑËßíÂ∫¶ËøõË°åÂàíÂàÜ,‰øùËØÅÊØè‰∏™ÂäüËÉΩÊ®°ÂùóÁöÑËÅåËÉΩÂçï‰∏Ä
  • Ê®°ÂùóÂåñ : ‰ªéUIËÆæËÆ°ÁöÑËßíÂ∫¶ËøõË°åÂàíÂàÜ,‰øùËØÅÂâçÁ´ØÊñπ‰æøUIÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÈáçÁî®

ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÊ≥®ÂÜå

ÂÖ®Â±ÄÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê≥®ÂÜåÊñπÂºè

ÊñπÂºè‰∏Ä : ‰ΩøÁî®Vue.extend,ÂèäÂÖ∂ÁÆÄÂåñÊ®°Âºè

<div id="app"><my-component></my-component><simple-my-component1></simple-my-component1><simple-my-component2></simple-my-component2></div><script>    //Ê≥®ÂÜåÁªÑ‰ª∂var component = Vue.extend({template: '<h2>Stay hungray,Stay foolish</h2>'});Vue.component('myComponent', component)//ÁÆÄÂåñÊ®°Âºè1Vue.component('simpleMyComponent1', Vue.extend({template: '<h3>Stay hungray,Stay foolish</h3>'}));    //ÁÆÄÂåñÊ®°Âºè2    Vue.component('simpleMyComponent2', {template: '<div><h4>Stay hungray,Stay foolish</h4><span>data</span></div>'});var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {}});</script>

ÊñπÂºè‰∫å : Â∞ÜtemplateÂÆö‰πâ‰∏∫Áã¨Á´ãÊ†áÁ≠æ,ÊèêÈ´ò‰ª£Á†ÅÂèØËØªÊÄß

<template id="myTemplate"><h2>Stay hungray,Stay foolish</h2></template><div id="app"><simple-my-component></simple-my-component></div><script>     //Ê≥®ÂÜåÁªÑ‰ª∂Vue.component('simpleMyComponent', Vue.extend({template: '#myTemplate'}));var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {}});</script>

Â±ÄÈÉ®ÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê≥®ÂÜåÊñπÂºè

ÊñπÂºè‰∏Ä : componentsÈÄâÈ°πÁî®‰∫é‰∏∫ÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê≥®ÂÜå‰ªéÂ§ñÈÉ®ÂºïÂÖ•ÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂

<template id="myTemplate"><h2>this is my component</h2></template><div id="app"><my-component></my-component></div><script>var myComponent = {template: '#myTemplate'}var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',components: {myComponent}});</script>

ÊñπÂºè‰∫å

<div id="app"><my-title1></my-title1><my-title2></my-title2></div><script>let myTitle1 = {name: 'myTitle',template: '<h2>Stdy hungry,Stdy foolish</h2>'}let myTitle2 = {name: 'myTitle2',template: '<h3>Stdy hungry,Stdy foolish</h3>'}var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',components: {myTitle1,myTitle2}    });</script>

Prop

Áà∂ÁªÑ‰ª∂Âú®ÂºïÁî®Â≠êÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÂêåÊó∂,ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáÂ±ûÊÄßÁªëÂÆö(v-bind)ÁöÑÂΩ¢ÂºèÊääÈúÄË¶Å‰º†ÈÄíÁªôÂ≠êÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ,‰ª•Â±ûÊÄßÁªëÂÆöÁöÑÂΩ¢Âºè,‰º†ÈÄíÂà∞Â≠êÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂÜÖÈÉ®,‰æõÂ≠êÁªÑ‰ª∂‰ΩøÁî®,Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app"><son-component v-bind:parentmsg="msg"></son-component></div><script>var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {msg: 'ËøôÊòØÁà∂ÁªÑ‰ª∂‰∏≠ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ'},components: {sonComponent: {props: ['parentmsg'], //Âè™ËØªtemplate: '<h3>ËøôÊòØÂ≠êÁªÑ‰ª∂--->{{parentmsg}}</h3>',}}});</script>

Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâ‰∫ã‰ª∂

Áà∂ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂêëÂ≠êÁªÑ‰ª∂‰º†ÈÄíÊñπÊ≥ï,‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÊòØ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁªëÂÆöÊú∫Âà∂,Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app"><my-component @func="show"></my-component></div><script>var myComponent = {template: '#myTemplate',methods: {getMethods() {this.$emit('func', '‰Ω†Â•Ω,ÊàëÊòØÂ≠êÁªÑ‰ª∂!')}}}var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',methods: {show(data) {window.alert('ËøôÊòØÁà∂ÁªÑ‰ª∂‰∏≠ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï,Â≠êÁªÑ‰ª∂‰º†ÈÄíËøáÊù•ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ‰∏∫:' + data)}},components: {myComponent}});</script>

Âä®ÊÄÅÁªÑ‰ª∂

ÁªÑ‰ª∂Èó¥ÁöÑÂàáÊç¢,ÊñπÂºè‰∏Ä : ‰ΩøÁî®if-else,Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app"><button @click="flag=true">ÁôªÂΩï</button><button @click="flag=false">Ê≥®ÂÜå</button><login v-if="flag"></login><regist v-else="flag"></regist></div><script>Vue.component('login', {template: '<h3>ËøôÊòØÁôªÂΩïÁªÑ‰ª∂</h3>'});Vue.component('regist', {template: '<h3>ËøôÊòØÊ≥®ÂÜåÁªÑ‰ª∂</h3>'});var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {flag: true}});</script>

ÁªÑ‰ª∂Èó¥ÁöÑÂàáÊç¢,ÊñπÂºè‰∫å : ‰ΩøÁî®componentÂÖÉÁ¥†,Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app"><button @click="componentName='login'">ÁôªÂΩï</button><button @click="componentName='regist'">Ê≥®ÂÜå</button><button @click="componentName='logout'">Ê≥®ÈîÄ</button><component :is="componentName"></component></div><script>Vue.component('login', {template: '<h3>ËøôÊòØÁôªÂΩïÁªÑ‰ª∂</h3>'});Vue.component('regist', {template: '<h3>ËøôÊòØÊ≥®ÂÜåÁªÑ‰ª∂</h3>'});Vue.component('logout', {template: '<h3>ËøôÊòØÊ≥®ÈîÄÁªÑ‰ª∂</h3>'});var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {componentName: 'login' //default}});</script>

entry.title: Vue.jsÁöÑËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåá‰ª§‰∏éËøáÊª§Âô®
entry.content:
Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ : VueÁöÑËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊåá‰ª§ÂèäËøáÊª§Âô®ÁöÑ‰ΩøÁî®

Êåá‰ª§

ÂÖàÂâçÊàë‰ª¨Êé•Ëß¶ËøáVueÊèê‰æõÁöÑ‚ÄôÂºÄÁÆ±Âç≥Áî®ÁöÑ‚ÄôÊåá‰ª§,Â¶Çv-bind,v-on,v-modelÁ≠â . .Èô§‰∫ÜËøô‰∫õÊåá‰ª§Â§ñ,Vue‰πüÂÖÅËÆ∏Êàë‰ª¨‰ΩøÁî®‰∏Ä‰∫õËá™ÂÆö‰πâÁöÑÊåá‰ª§Âìü~ ‰∏Ä‰∏™Êåá‰ª§ÂÆö‰πâÂØπË±°ÂèØ‰ª•Êèê‰æõÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÂá†‰∏™Èí©Â≠êÂáΩÊï∞ (Âùá‰∏∫ÂèØÈÄâ) :

  1. bind : Âè™Ë∞ÉÁî®‰∏ÄÊ¨°,Êåá‰ª§Á¨¨‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ÂÖÉÁ¥†Êó∂Ë∞ÉÁî®. Âú®ËøôÈáåÂèØ‰ª•ËøõË°å‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÊÄßÁöÑÂàùÂßãÂåñËÆæÁΩÆ
  2. inserted : Ë¢´ÁªëÂÆöÂÖÉÁ¥†ÊèíÂÖ•Áà∂ËäÇÁÇπÊó∂Ë∞ÉÁî®(‰ªÖ‰øùËØÅÁà∂ËäÇÁÇπÂ≠òÂú®,‰ΩÜ‰∏ç‰∏ÄÂÆöÂ∑≤Ë¢´ÊèíÂÖ•ÊñáÊ°£‰∏≠)
  3. update : ÊâÄÂú®ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑVNodeÊõ¥Êñ∞Êó∂Ë∞ÉÁî®,‰ΩÜÊòØÂèØËÉΩÂèëÁîüÂú®ÂÖ∂Â≠êVNodeÊõ¥Êñ∞‰πãÂâç. Êåá‰ª§ÁöÑÂÄºÂèØËÉΩÂèëÁîü‰∫ÜÊîπÂèò,‰πüÂèØËÉΩÊ≤°Êúâ. ‰ΩÜÊòØ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáÊØîËæÉÊõ¥Êñ∞ÂâçÂêéÁöÑÂÄºÊù•ÂøΩÁï•‰∏çÂøÖË¶ÅÁöÑÊ®°ÊùøÊõ¥Êñ∞ (ËØ¶ÁªÜÁöÑÈí©Â≠êÂáΩÊï∞ÂèÇÊï∞ËßÅ : https://cn.vuejs.org/v2/guide/custom-directive.html)
  4. componentUpdated : Êåá‰ª§ÊâÄÂú®ÁªÑ‰ª∂ÁöÑVNodeÂèäÂÖ∂Â≠êVNodeÂÖ®ÈÉ®Êõ¥Êñ∞ÂêéË∞ÉÁî®
  5. unbind : Âè™Ë∞ÉÁî®‰∏ÄÊ¨°,Êåá‰ª§‰∏éÂÖÉÁ¥†Ëß£ÁªëÊó∂Ë∞ÉÁî®

Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÂÖ®Â±ÄÊåá‰ª§

Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖ®Â±ÄÁöÑÊåá‰ª§,Áî®‰∫éËá™ÂÆö‰πâÂ≠ó‰ΩìÈ¢úËâ≤,Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app"><p v-color="'blueviolet'">{{msg}}</p></div><script>Vue.directive('color', {bind: function(el, colorStr) {el.style.color = colorStr.value}});var vm = new Vue({    el: '#app',data: {msg: 'hi Vue !'}});</script>

Â§ßÂ§öÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ã,Êàë‰ª¨ÂèØËÉΩÂè™ÊÉ≥Âú®bindÂíåupdateÈí©Â≠ê‰∏ä‰ΩúÈáçÂ§çÂä®‰Ωú,Âπ∂‰∏çÊÉ≥ÂÖ≥ÂøÉÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÁöÑÈí©Â≠ê,ÈÇ£‰πàÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ËøôÊ†∑ÁÆÄÂÜôÂìü :

<div id="app"><p v-color="'blueviolet'">{{msg}}</p></div><script>Vue.directive('color', function(el, colorStr) {el.style.color = colorStr.value});var vm = new Vue({    el: '#app',data: {msg: 'hi Vue !'}});</script>

Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÁßÅÊúâÊåá‰ª§

Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁßÅÊúâÁöÑÊåá‰ª§,Áî®‰∫éËá™ÂÆö‰πâÂ≠ó‰ΩìÈ¢úËâ≤,ÂÖ∂Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app"><p v-color="'blueviolet'">{{msg}}</p></div><script>var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {msg: 'hi Vue !'},directives: {'color': {    bind: function(el, colorStr) {el.style.color = colorStr.value}}}});</script>

(Âêå‰∏ä)ÂèØÁÆÄÂÜô‰∏∫ :

<div id="app"><p v-color="'blueviolet'">{{msg}}</p></div><script>var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {msg: 'hi Vue !'},directives: {    'color': function(el, colorStr) {    el.style.color = colorStr.value}}});</script>

ËøáÊª§Âô®

Vue.jsÂÖÅËÆ∏‰Ω†Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâËøáÊª§Âô®,ÂèØË¢´Áî®‰∫é‰∏Ä‰∫õÂ∏∏ËßÅÁöÑÊñáÊú¨Ê†ºÂºèÂåñ,ËøáÊª§Âô®ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®Âú®‰∏§‰∏™Âú∞Êñπ : ÂèåËä±Êã¨Âè∑ÊèíÂÄºÂíåv-bindË°®ËææÂºè (ÂêéËÄÖ‰ªé 2.1.0+ ÂºÄÂßãÊîØÊåÅ). ËøáÊª§Âô®Â∫îËØ•Ë¢´Ê∑ªÂä†Âú®JavaScriptË°®ËææÂºèÁöÑÂ∞æÈÉ®,Áî±ÁÆ°ÈÅìÁ¨¶ : | ÊåáÁ§∫,Ë°®ËææÂºèÁöÑÂÄºÂ∞Ü‰Ωú‰∏∫ÂΩ¢ÂèÇ‰º†ÂÖ•Âà∞filter‰∏≠,Á§∫‰æã‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app"><h2>{{title}}</h2><h2>{{title | titleFilter1}}</h2><h2>{{title | titleFilter1 | titleFilter2}}</h2></div><script>var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {title: 'Demo#%Program#%For#%Filter'},filters: {titleFilter1(value) {return value.replace(/#/g, ' ')},titleFilter2(value) {return value.replace(/%/g, '')}}});</script>

Èô§Âú®ÁªÑ‰ª∂‰∏≠ÂÆö‰πâfilterÂ§ñ,VueËøòÂÖÅËÆ∏Âú®ÂºÄÂèëËÄÖÂú®ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂÆö‰πâfilter,‰∏éÈÄâÈ°πfilter‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÊòØ,ÂÖ®Â±ÄfilterÂèØ‰ª•Âú®‰ªª‰ΩïÁªÑ‰ª∂ÂíåÂÆû‰æã‰∏≠Ëµ∑‰ΩúÁî®Âìü,Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app"><h2>{{title}}</h2><h2>{{title | titleFilter1}}</h2><h2>{{title | titleFilter1 | titleFilter2}}</h2></div><script>Vue.filter('titleFilter1', value => {return value.replace(/#/g, ' ')});Vue.filter('titleFilter2', value => {return value.replace(/%/g, '')});var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {title: 'Demo#%Program#%For#%Filter'}});</script>

Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

ÂÖ®Â±ÄËøáÊª§Âô®

ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖ®Â±Äfilter,Áî®‰∫éÊ†ºÂºèÂåñÊåáÂÆöÂ≠óÁ¨¶,ÂÖ∂Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app">{{msg | msgFilter('Keep')}}</div><script>Vue.filter('msgFilter', function(msg, filterStr) {return msg.replace(/Stay/g, filterStr) //‰ΩøÁî®Ê≠£ÂàôË°®ËææÂºèÂåπÈÖçÂ≠óÁ¨¶});var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {msg: 'Stay hungry,Stay foolish ~'}});</script>

ÁßÅÊúâËøáÊª§Âô®

ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈÄâÈ°πfilter,Áî®‰∫éÊ†ºÂºèÂåñÊåáÂÆöÂ≠óÁ¨¶,ÂÖ∂Á§∫‰æãÁ®ãÂ∫èÂ¶Ç‰∏ã :

<div id="app">{{msg | msgFilter('keep')}}</div><script>    var vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data: {msg: 'Stay hungry,Stay foolish ~'},filters: { msgFilter: function(msg, filterStr) {return msg.replace(/Stay/g, filterStr)    }    }});</script>

entry.title: Vue.jsÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÂìçÂ∫îÂºèÂéüÁêÜ
entry.content:
Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞ : Vue.jsÂØπÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÂìçÂ∫îÂºèÂéüÁêÜ

ÁÆÄ‰ªã : Vue‰∏≠ÊúÄÈáçË¶ÅÁöÑÊ¶ÇÂøµÂ∞±ÊòØÂìçÂ∫îÂºèÊï∞ÊçÆ,‰∏ÄÊñπÈù¢ÊòØÊåáË°çÁîüÂíåÂÖÉÊï∞ÊçÆ‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑÂìçÂ∫î,ÈÄöËøáÊï∞ÊçÆÈìæÊù•ÂÆûÁé∞. Âè¶‰∏ÄÊñπÈù¢ÊòØÊåáËßÜÂõæ‰∏éÊï∞ÊçÆ‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑÁªëÂÆö .

ÂàùÂßãÊï∞ÊçÆÈìæ

Êï∞ÊçÆÈìæÂú®Â≠¶ÊúØ‰∏äË¢´ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏∫ËøûÈÄöÊï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÈìæË∑Ø,Âú®ËøôÊù°ÈìæË∑Ø‰∏äÊúâ‰∏ÄÂà∞Â§ö‰∏™Êï∞ÊçÆËµ∑ÁÇπ(ÂÖÉÊï∞ÊçÆ),Âπ∂ÈÄöËøáÊîπÁÇπ‰∏çÊñ≠Ë°çÁîüÊâ©Â±ïÊñ∞ÁöÑËäÇÁÇπ(Ë°çÁîüÊï∞ÊçÆ),ÂΩ¢Êàê ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∫ûÂ§ßÁöÑÁΩëÁä∂ÁªìÊûÑ. ÂΩì‰Ω†‰øÆÊîπÊï∞ÊçÆËµ∑ÁÇπÊó∂, ÊâÄÊúâÂ≠òÂú®ÁΩë‰∏äÁöÑËäÇÁÇπÂÄºÈÉΩÂ∞Ü‰ºöÂêåÊ≠•Êõ¥Êñ∞,Â¶Ç‰∏ãÂõæÊâÄÁ§∫ :

Vue‰∏≠ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÈìæ

VueÂÆû‰æãÊèê‰æõ‰∫ÜcomputedËÆ°ÁÆóÂ±ûÊÄßÈÄâÈ°π,‰ª•‰æõÂºÄÂèëËÄÖÁîüÊàêË°çÁîüÊï∞ÊçÆÂØπË±°. ËôΩÁÑ∂ËÆ°ÁÆóÂ±ûÊÄß‰ª•ÂáΩÊï∞ÂΩ¢ÂºèÂ£∞Êòé,Âç¥Âπ∂‰∏çÊé•ÂèóÂèÇÊï∞,‰πüÂè™ËÉΩ‰ª•Â±ûÊÄßÁöÑÊñπÂºèË∞ÉÁî®. Áî±‰∫éËÆ°ÁÆóÂ±ûÊÄßÁöÑthisÊåáÂêëVueÂÆû‰æã,ÊâÄ‰ª•ÂÆÉÂèØ‰ª•Ëé∑ÂèñÂÆû‰æã‰∏äÊâÄÊúâÂ∑≤ÊåÇËΩΩÁöÑÂèØËßÅÂ±ûÊÄß,Â¶Ç‰∏ãÁ§∫‰æãÊ≠§Á®ãÂ∫è :

<!DOCTYPE html><html><head><meta charset="utf-8"><script src="../resources/vue.js"></script><title>Vue‰∏≠ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÈìæ</title><style>#app{font-family: "lucida console",sans-serif;color: #67B168;}.data-label{display: inline-block;width: 160px;}</style></head><body><div id="app"><p><strong class="data-label">A</strong><input type="text" v-model="a" /></p><p><strong class="data-label">B</strong><input type="text" v-model="b" /></p><p><strong class="data-label">C=A*2+2</strong>{{c}}</p><p><strong class="data-label">D=A+B*2</strong>{{d}}</p><p><strong class="data-label">E=B/2</strong>{{e}}</p><p><strong class="data-label">F=C+D</strong>{{f}}</p><p><strong class="data-label">G=D-E</strong>{{g}}</p></div><script>let vm = new Vue({el: '#app',data() {return {a: 3,b: 4}},//ËÆ°ÁÆóÂ±ûÊÄßÂ∞ÜË¢´Ê∑∑ÂÖ•Âà∞VueÂÆû‰æã‰∏≠.//ÊâÄÊúâgetterÂíåsetterÁöÑthis‰∏ä‰∏ãÊñáËá™Âä®Âú∞ÁªëÂÆö‰∏∫VueÂÆû‰æã.computed: {c() {return this.a * 2 + 2},d() {return Number(this.a) + this.b * 2},e() {return this.b / 2},f() {return Number(this.c) + Number(this.d)},g() {return this.d - this.e}}});</script></body></html>

Á®ãÂ∫èËøêË°åÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÂõæÊâÄÁ§∫ :

Êï∞ÊçÆÁªëÂÆöËßÜÂõæ
